The New York Times is reporting that the Omicron variant of SARS-CoV-2 was especially deadly for the most vaccinated demographic in America, the elderly. Specifically, at the peak of the Omicron wave in March of this year, of those in the oldest age demographic, 40% of those who died from COVID were vaccinated. How can anyone stare this figure in the face and still argue that the “vaccines” are effective? What rational person would say that the “vaccines” work when 2 vaccinated people in the most vulnerable age group die for every 3 unvaccinated who die? In what world is that considered “effective”? Anyone continuing to advocate the “vaccine”, especially public health officials and elected officeholders, needs to explain with empirical data how these vaccines are effective to justify the unknown long-term risk the “vaccines” pose.

The Omicron variant of SARS-CoV-2 is mutating so rapidly that new “vaccines” retooled to its genetic material are not able to keep pace. This is yet another nail in the coffin that the “vaccines” against COVID simply aren’t effective. One, there would be no need to create Omicron-optimized shots if the existing ones were effective against Omicron, so that alone suggests that the existing mRNA treatments from Pfizer and Moderna are ineffective. Two, the rapid mutation of the virus shows the folly in pursuing a vaccination strategy over a treatment strategy for fighting COVID. The flu provides an illustrative example of the challenges of fighting a mutating virus, as flu vaccine synthesis is a constant struggle that is not always effective for a given year. And note that the flu is a virus that goes through annual seasonal cycles of mutation. COVID, on the other hand, strikes in semiannual waves (twice a year), so the rate of mutation is likely also higher (i.e. as it adapts to the human immune  systems it encounters). It’s time for public health and elected officials to admit that the COVID “vaccines” were a failure, so that we can instead invest time and money into alternatives that actually work.

Once again, the US is admitting that it is directly antagonizing Russia, this time via offensive cyber operations, as a belligerent in the Russia-Ukraine War, inching closer to Russian retaliation against the US. China and Russia are preparing their pretext for retaliatory cyberattacks against the US for its direct offensive cyber operations against Russia. Granted, rhetoric like this is very often just empty saber-rattling. Even so, China and Russia will be able to claim that they gave the US due advance warning of retaliatory responses to US offensive cyber operations against them. This statement is also proof of just how thoroughly the US has pushed Russia into the arms of China. By trying to sap Russia’s strength by miring it in its conflict with Ukraine, the US risks nuclear war all just to hobble a second-rate power—Russia’s economy is smaller than Italy’s—with little global geopolitical relevance. Russia would have been much more useful as a Western wedge against China: even though Russia would have been unlikely to become a friendly pro-Western power, it could at least see the wisdom in joining forces with the West to diminish an ascendant superpower (China) on its border. Instead, the US threw that away and instead reinforced China’s position by giving it another nuclear-armed ally as a land buffer between it and Western Europe. This the kind of failure of imagination and an egregious mishandling of American foreign policy that could ONLY occur under the arrogant, myopic leadership of the Democrats’ leading minds.

The CDC is ending its COVID testing requirements for foreign travelers to the US, but employees of the federal government and many of its contractors are still required to be vaccinated to keep their jobs. How is it that the government’s foremost public health body believes that travelers from overseas pose so little risk of spreading COVID that testing is unnecessary, but the federal government still makes employees vaccinate for fear of spreading COVID (even though, as is well-proven now, the mRNA “vaccines” don’t stop the spread of COVID)? Why is our government holding its own citizens to stricter standards, and infringing more egregiously on individual freedom, than foreigners? Why does the US government prize the freedom of non-Americans more highly than Americans?

Inflation continues to climb, now at the officially acknowledged rate of 8.6%. As the surge in inflation shows no sign of stopping, it is on track to be the worst inflation since the Great Depression if it continues for much longer. How is it that Biden and the Democrats still claim to be superior stewards of the economy than Trump and the Republicans?

The left once again proves that THEY are the racists by being the only party in political discourse making an offensive racial association, so they can pat themselves on the back for supposedly addressing it. The left is insisting that monkeypox be renamed because it is racist against black people. But as any true non-discriminatory person can tell you, there is no intrinsic link between monkeys and black people. It is only those who seek to draw a link who are the real racists. For the overwhelming majority of Americans, there is no such link. Monkeys are monkeys. Black people are people. This is widely understood and accepted. For the left to say that monkeypox, which bears no connection with black people, is racist against black people only reveals that it is the LEFT that sees an derogatory link between monkeys, a pox which bears their name, and black people. Consider who the real racist is, the group that views black people, monkeys, and monkeypox as unrelated (normal, non-leftists), or the group that insists that there is a relationship and that it is negative (the left)? This is a classic case of psychological projection: the left is accusing others who exhibit no racial animus of the racism that is seething within their own ranks. Find any remarks suggesting that black people are inferior and most (if not all) of the time you will be able to trace their origin or reinforcement back to a Democrat.

Biden openly admitted that Americans are, on the whole, feeling dejected. It is, to say the least, highly uncommon for presidents to speak in these terms. They typically will frame the state of the nation and the spirit of its people optimistically and aspirationally. That Biden is saying something so contrary is telling. In fairness to Biden, it may well be that most presidents sugarcoat the state of the country and he has instead elected to be honest. If this is in fact his angle, that would be commendable. In spite of whatever candor he may be trying to engender, the fact remains that Americans are dispirited, and it is his policies which have gotten them there. Americans were already weary from a pandemic which neither party had a hand in unleashing (at least directly). But the Democrats have done seemingly everything they can to chip away at what flagging morale Americans had left: the Democrats shut down the country for years, which smothered small businesses, drove up drug abuse, drove up domestic violence, drove up rates of mental illness and suicide rates, and stunted the development of a generation of children. And then to make matters worse, the Democrats then spearheaded the effort to print trillions of dollars, some of which went directly to individual American citizens but most of which went to corporations, which has driven inflation to record levels. So, yes, Americans ARE “really, really down”, and the Democrats have kicked Americans while they’re down at every turn.

Biden’s Fed Chair is saying that it’s a “possibility” that the US will enter a recession, clearly ignorant of how very clearly the country is in a recession already. Inflation is at its highest in 40 years and still climbing. The market is trending down across the board. Small businesses have been decimated by the ineffective pandemic lockdowns, destroying the livelihoods of millions of Americans.  Food shortages are commonplace. The national debt has leapt up trillions of dollars in the course of only a few years. How is this NOT a recession? The Biden administration is clearly completely unmoored from reality, and the plight of ordinary Americans, despite insisting that they, as Democrats, stand up for the little guy. All the Democrats have accomplished in the last few years is plunging small businesses into financial oblivion and transferring trillions in taxpayer dollars to their corporate donors.

The Democrats are continuing to bewail the supposed danger of Republicans questioning the validity of the 2020 election despite the fact that dozens of Democrats spent minutes of aggregate airtime stating explicitly that Trump was an “illegitimate president” after his victory in 2016. A 10-minute video is circulating on social media of Democrats stating without reservation that Trump was not duly and fairly elected, that the election was stolen from Clinton in 2016. But because the Democrats have their media allies to control the public discourse, the Democrats get a pass on impugning the integrity of a presidential election. In their view, the Democrats have every right to insist on the illegitimacy of any election they lose, whereas the Republicans must accept every election loss as fair and beyond reproach, with any dissent or questioning constituting treason. This dangerous double-standard has been allowed to extend to the most vital characteristic of our democracy: the right to pursue proof that an election was conducted fairly, wherein the winner can prove their victory to the satisfaction of all reasonable doubters. To the Democrats, this ultimate of all rights is reserved only for them, denied to all their foes. What kind of democratic republic does that make?

Biden accidentally revealed a cue card replete with reminders to perform basic, intuitive functions like sitting down. The card featured instructions such as  “YOU take YOUR seat”, “YOU thank participants”, and “YOU depart”. These are the kind of instructions you would have to give a small child, not ones which should be necessary for the elected leader of the most powerful nation on Earth. How is it that anyone can claim that Biden is in full possession of his mental faculties when he requires written instructions like this? Trump, as inept as he was, was never caught with anything like this. The same people who said Trump was not mentally equipped to be president are rushing to defend Biden in spite of even more definitive proof of Biden’s mental decline than Trump’s. Once again, the Democrats’ psychological projection is hard at work: they accuse the Republicans of what they themselves are far more guilty.

DHS is warning that there will likely be “violent extremism” in the wake of the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down Roe v. Wade, allowing states to make their own determinations regarding the legality of abortions. If one thinks rationally about this, it is clear who will be the perpetrator of this violence. Which side has a greater motive for violence, the side who got their way in this ruling (the right) or the side that didn’t (the left)? This is clear to a moderately intelligent 9-year-old. The left, having lost in the legal arena, has no option left but to pursue extralegal means for securing their right to abort fetuses. Of course, this is yet more evidence of just how inclined toward violence the extremists on the left are. Over and over mainstream left figures and their media ally pundits have insisted that ONLY the right pursues political violence, and that furthermore this fiction is grounds to suppress all politically right discourse. Does anyone think for even one second that the media will discuss the urgent need to censor the left to stop left-wing political violence—violence warned by a Democrat administration’s DHS—the way that the media immediately insists on censoring the right to stop right-wing violence? Of course not. That’s because to the left and nearly all of the media, principle and the evenhanded administration of justice means nothing to them. The only thing that matters is securing their agenda, and they will impose any double-standard in service of that end.

A prominent Democrat senator is calling for the destruction of the Supreme Court by packing the bench until the Democrats get their way. Until now, both parties have had the sense to respect the tradition of keeping the Supreme Court at a static number of seats. But now the Democrats are so desperate to have their way that they are willing to upend centuries of tradition and warp the court into what is essentially the president’s rubber stamp body. Consider the situation rationally. If a Democrat president appoints more leftist justices until the left wins every court case, are Republicans just going to sit and take it, ceding permanent control of the courts to the Democrats? Once the Democrats open the door to court packing, what’s stopping them from doing it again? Why would they risk the Supreme Court ever defying them when they have the power to pack the bench whenever they want? So against this backdrop, why would Republicans just let the Democrats do this and control the Supreme Court forever? The Republicans will have to play ball, packing the bench with their own conservative justices. What would result is that the Supreme Court will simply be tipped in favor of whichever party controls the White House: whenever a new party wins the presidency, that new president will add justices until they have a majority on the court. Thus, the Supreme Court, the Judicial Branch of the federal government, will lose all autonomy, and instead of being a co-equal branch of government with the Legislative Branch and Executive Branch it will simply become a subservient instrument of the Executive Branch. Why would the Founding Fathers create the Supreme Court as a separate branch of government if it simply served the whims of the president? What would have been the point in defining the Supreme Court as a distinct entity separate from the President? It very quickly becomes apparent to anyone capable of reasoning that the idea of arbitrarily expanding the Supreme Court, as Warren (and, probably soon more prominent Democrats) defiles the very essence of a democratic republic that the Founding Fathers envisioned. Even worse, should they accomplish this debasement of the court, it would lead to tyrannical abuses the likes of which most Americans could never comprehend. What happens when a president who controls the Supreme Court simply rules by decree, deprives any American of all their freedoms at will, and deploys the military might of a world superpower to crush all dissent? Does anyone think a Supreme Court in such a state would stop the president? The president also has the power to dismiss Congress, and can make appointments without Congressional approval if Congress is not in session, so even Congress’s check could easily be bypassed. If the Supreme Court is allowed to be profaned as Warren suggests, it will mark the irreversible beginning of a tyrannical presidency in our country.

Some Chicago residents received anonymous election reminder texts revealing the location of their homes. In Chicago, there is essentially no electoral activity from Republicans: the vast majority of candidates on the ballot in Chicago are Democrat, with the rest being leftist third-parties or independents. So which party is most likely by far to have produced and sent these texts? The third-parties and independents don’t have the resources to acquire location data for potential voters. Not only does the Democratic Party have their own huge voter database (separate from the government-maintained official voter rolls), but they also have an enormous financial margin against all other parties (to say nothing of their utter dwarfing of independents). Location data is not cheap, and must be bought from data miners in bulk, so it could have only realistically been the Democrats which sent out these creepy text messages. Does it not alarm citizens that a political party possesses such sensitive data about them? How is it that ANY party should be allowed to handle and disseminate voters’ location data? SMS text messages are trivially easy to intercept, as they are not encrypted. So any adversary looking to stalk a given individual could have simply intercepted these messages, which link a phone number to an address (and possibly more). This is only one example of how this data could be abused. Who knows the other ways in which the possessors of this data are using it without citizens’ knowledge or consent?

Fauci, the highest-profile “vaccine” apologist imaginable, has come down with COVID twice in the span of a couple of weeks despite receiving 4 doses of the jab and a full course of Paxlovid. Fauci has maintained for the entire lifetime of the mRNA COVID immune therapy that it is extremely effective, that there is nearly no chance a “vaccinated” individual will contract COVID, and that therefore everyone should take it. And yet he has received 4 doses of the treatment, contracted COVID, took a full course of the Paxlovid pill, and contracted COVID again only days after beginning treatment via Paxlovid. After his bout with COVID ran its course, he credited Paxlovid, stating that his illness would have been more severe had it not been for Paxlovid. Strangely, he did not credit the “vaccine” at all for surviving COVID. Why? He has maintained its significant efficacy even as data shows it does little to nothing against Omicron (the strain which is now predominant in the US, and therefore which he almost certainly contracted). If the “vaccine” is so effective, how come he didn’t cite it, along with Paxlovid, as one of the reasons why he survived COVID despite being in his 80s? The other notable element of this story is that this is yet another instance of an individual who is highly dosed with the mRNA immune therapy catching COVID anyway, taking Paxlovid for it, and then contracting a “rebound” case of COVID after the Paxlovid treatment. Again, Paxlovid was only officially tested on the unvaccinated (for submission for FDA approval, which it subsequently got). In this testing, “rebound” cases were quite rare. However, when prescribed for vaccinated individuals—which is technically an “off-label” prescription—rebound cases appear to be surprisingly common. As Iverson cited, there are instances in which families of quadruple-jabbed individuals all experience Paxlovid-linked rebound cases, which is extremely unlikely if such cases are a rarity. And yet even as this supposedly rare side effect is manifesting quite commonly, there have been no calls to take Paxlovid off the market or advise doctors against prescribing it to the vaccinated. This again shows the suspicious pro-”vaccine” bias at work. The unvaccinated are condemned for taking extremely safe drugs off-label to treat COVID (i.e. ivermectin), yet the vaccinated are not chided in the slightest for taking a drug off-label (i.e. Paxlovid) which has an apparent correlation with a side effect which is rare in on-label prescriptions (i.e. prescribed for the unvaccinated). If public health officials fulfilled their duties as intended, and without bias, they would be investigating the possible dangers associated with the vaccinated taking Paxlovid. But it is clear that such principled officials are not in the majority in our public health institutions. Instead, these institutions favor those citizens who comply with their dictates—dictates to take an experimental immune therapy—and persecute those citizens who resist, on penalty of deprivation of basic freedoms.

Google cares about the privacy of liberals, while conservatives enjoy no such right to privacy. Google has stated that it will voluntarily delete the location data of women who seek abortions. Indeed, no one seeking a legal medical procedure should have their whereabouts tracked. But of course, this privacy protection is not extended to anyone else, since Google’s is one of the most liberal-concentrated workforces anywhere in the world. Conservatives will get their location data tracked if they go to a place of worship, seek addiction treatment for opioids, or exercise their First Amendment rights to protest Democrats’ policies. This just goes to show that, because leftists have seized most of the major levers of cultural, technological, and political power in the nation, they are free to wield their power to shield their adherents and persecute everyone else. Google, one could well imagine, will not shed a tear if a tyrannical Democrat asks them for identifying data on everyone who peacefully protested their policies. But even if a jurisdiction outlawed abortion by majority vote, and a legally authorized warrant were served to them, Google will not comply with state attempts to enforce the law. Google is likely within its rights to do so. But the partisan manner in which it chooses to exercise those rights demonstrates just how completely the left imposes its will on the nation.

A number of pregnancy centers which do not offer abortions were firebombed in retaliation for the Supreme Court opening the door to states outlawing abortions if they so choose. The left routinely claims that only the right commits political violence, with some going so far as to label the entire Republican Party as a “terrorist organization”. And yet here are more than a dozen incidents of ostensibly liberals setting fire to pregnancy centers and churches as political acts. The left has no business claiming that the right is the only violent political faction. If anything, if we tally the score, it seems like the left is more violent than the right. Whereas the members of the right were responsible for the Charlottesville rioting, Dylan Roof’s attack on black churchgoers, and the Capitol Riots (in which only rioters died, and inflicted more symbolic than real injury), and perhaps the odd mass shooting, members of the left were responsible for the attempted killing of Republican Congressmen at a softball practice, the slow-burn of Antifa street violence in Portland and Seattle, the nationwide riots following the George Floyd protests, the riots in Kenosha following the Jacob Blake protests, the New York subway shooting by a radical left black separatist (i.e. black supremacist), and the shooting of mostly black shoppers in Buffalo (committed by a self-described “left-wing authoritarian”). Viewed in this light, it would seem that yet again the left is projecting onto the right the penchant for violence that the left itself harbors but does not want to admit. Certainly, a propensity for violence does not describe the majority of adherents to left or right ideology—most leftists and rightists do not condone violence—but the left should not so freely accuse others of misdeeds which it is more guilty of.

In the wake of states moving to criminalize abortion after the overturn of Roe v. Wade, the federal government is moving to circumvent those states’ laws by facilitating access to abortion pills nationwide. It is an brazen overreach and abuse of power by the federal government to help citizens circumvent laws in their states simply because the federal government does not like those states’ laws. According to the Federalist papers, and provisions in the constitution itself, sovereignty resides with the states, and the citizens of states reserve the right to govern themselves as they choose (via their elected state representatives). What right does the federal government have to decide what state laws a state should be able to effectively enforce? How is it not the very definition of tyranny to intervene in the self-government of a sovereign body to negate its enforcement of its own legitimate laws? There are legal means for the federal government to pursue its aims of mandating all states provide abortion procedures, such as amending the US constitution and thus superseding state laws, but the federal government is not pursuing these legal avenues. Instead it is infringing on state sovereignty and freedom from arbitrary meddling by the federal executive, in violation of a check from the federal judiciary. This galling behavior should alarm anyone who values individual liberties in this country. But of course, those who claim to defend rights most zealously, those on the left, are cheering as the federal government thwarts state sovereignty.

The US is officially in a recession by textbook economic definition, as the nation experienced two consecutive quarters of negative GDP growth. The Democrats swore they were such superior stewards of the economy compared to the Republicans, and yet with COVID restrictions lifted and the lethality of the disease much reduced from its peak, the economy is still struggling. Biden’s administration has maintained up until now that the nation is not in a recession, so we’ll see if they maintain this delusional line or if they accede to the reality of events.

Yet again, liberals prove that they’re the racist ones by implying that they don’t think non-white people are capable of showing up to important meetings on time. When a liberal bureaucrat pushed back a scheduled meeting of a state governmental body, she justified it by stating that “urgency is a white supremacy value”, implying that of course non-whites could not be expected to act on any sense of urgency on any topic, even topics which concern them intimately. Any normal, moral person in this multicultural country of ours can tell you that of course anyone of any race can experience a sense of urgency in regard to some issue. Only the left is arguing that certain races aren’t capable of urgency, or just intrinsically have no interest in urgency. Urgency is a trait anyone of any background can INDIVIDUALLY choose to embrace or reject. To tie it to race is the very definition of racism—only the left has done so, and worse, they hold it up their racism as racially enlightened virtue.

Biden’s latest tactic for bringing down gas prices is to literally just ask companies to charge less money, betraying the fact that he doesn’t have any better ideas. Bezos, who leans left politically and has supported the Democrats heavily, even criticized Biden for clearly demonstrating his inability to understand basic economics. Does Biden really think that, at a time when Americans are crying out for cheaper gas, all petroleum companies have formed an ad hoc cartel to fix gas prices? First of all, if they did, the Biden administration could simply prosecute them and not only bring down prices but extract billions in damages which would go straight into the Treasury. And second of all, if every petroleum company fixed high prices, wouldn’t the one company that brought prices down reap huge profits as every consumer flocked to them? So the fact that prices are high very likely has nothing to do with petroleum companies just being blindly greedy, in a coordinated way where no single company steps out of line to reap immense rewards.

After every mass shooting the left immediately tries to pin it to the right, but if that’s the game the left wants to play, in regards to the most recent attack on a Fourth of July parade, 5 minutes of reasoning will make it clear that, if the shooter had ANY political alignment—a huge and unlikely if—it was on the left. It is most likely that the shooter was not politically motivated, and that he simply took advantage of the holiday’s large outdoor gathering of people in close proximity. However, IF there is a political dimension, it is almost certainly left, not right. Which side of the spectrum views the American flag as a symbol of racism and oppression? The left. To which political faction did the last few shooters belong, of those who had political leanings (the Buffalo shooter, the New York subway shooter)? The left. What political demographic do those with neon-colored dyed hair and an obsession with rap and stardom, as the shooter in Highland Park had, overwhelmingly belong to? The left. Although the site of the attack is a liberal town with a large Jewish population, none of the shooter’s social media content nor any evidence collected from his home indicate any antisemitism. And of course, there’s the fact that he executed the attack on Independence Day, the single most sacred day of the year for conservatives (even more so than Christmas, as not all conservatives are Christian, but they almost all hold immense pride in the nation). Again, it’s most likely that the shooter was just a troubled young man whose friends and family ignored blatant red flags. But if there IS a political dimension, the case is strong that it is left.

Crowds in Chicago threw fireworks at police on the Fourth of July, once again demonstrating that the left has a casual, shockingly common, homicidal contempt for law enforcement. In media coverage of these incidents, the media seems to forget that explosives of any kind are deadly. What transpired in Chicago over the Fourth of July weekend was nothing less than people attempting to inflict fatal injury on police officers deployed to keep everyone safe. Again, though the political leaning was not stated explicitly, a 9-year-old could easily reason this out: it is significantly more likely that the side that chants “ACAB” (“all cops are bastards”) threw the fireworks than the side that rallies around “Blue Lives Matter”. What is most alarming is how casual these attacks were. This was not the obsessively meticulous work of left-wing radical who, in fairness, could not be taken to represent the left generally. These were people who saw a fleeting window of opportunity to inflict harm on the police un-premeditated and simply took it because it was there. This is what starts to assemble the case that the homicidal hatred of the police is not a fringe view on the left, but increasingly the left-mainstream.

The National Guard has purged 40,000 soldiers, and the Reserves 22,000, for not submitting to being jabbed with an experimental mRNA immune therapy that, as of the discharge of these soldiers, is completely ineffective at preventing or lessening the severity of a case of COVID. It was already audacious enough to require soldiers to take the mRNA “vaccine” when it was rammed through the EUA process, which classifies drugs approved under its authority as experimental drugs on the market, caveat emptor. But now that a very different COVID, Omicron, makes up nearly all cases and data shows that the “vaccine” does nothing to reduce the chance of catching it, forcing troops to take the treatment is arbitrary. As data from Walgreens shows, a higher percentage of unvaccinated people tested for COVID (during the current Omicron wave) tested positive than the percentage of tested unvaccinated people testing positive—by a factor of 50% (32% vs 21%). Surely the military is not unaware of this data. In fact, it probably has even more data of its own, which is very unlikely to contradict data like Walgreens’ but reinforce it. So what could the justification for discharging these troops possibly be? The only one that comes to mind is ejecting those who will not unquestionably follow the orders of a commander-in-chief who uses vaccination as a proxy partisan sieve, and whose party is heavily invested in the companies who manufacture said “vaccine”. There could be another reason, but no convincing case has been made as to why soldiers should be discharged for not wanting to take an experimental “vaccine” which, if it ever worked, works no longer. It’s also supremely imprudent. Imagine if it were discovered later that the “vaccine” induces some extremely fatal defect into the biology of everyone who took it. If every soldier took the vaccine, our entire military would die off. But if some were unvaccinated, then if such an unlikely, but possible, scenario played out, we would not be left defenseless. Our military rose to world dominance for taking precautions like that, but if the disastrous withdrawal from Afghanistan didn’t prove it, our military is a far cry from its superpower-level former glory.

The UK is seeing excess deaths 15.9% higher than the 5-year average, and only 10.8% of the excess deaths reported are directly attributable to COVID. This is a terrifyingly large number of excess deaths, and COVID only explains 1 in 10 of these—this means that excess deaths specifically from COVID would only be a 1.59% excess death rate (i.e. 10% of 15.9%). So where are all these deaths coming from? And why is this not headline news in the British press? The only sudden, singular changes in medical/biological factors for mass numbers of Britons in the last 5 years have been COVID and the mRNA COVID “vaccine”. So if COVID is only responsible for 10% of the 15.9% increase, what else could account for most (though, of course, not all) of the rest of that figure but the “vaccine”? What other possible explanation can the data show? Data from countries around the world is making it increasingly difficult to escape the conclusion that the “vaccine” is far more dangerous than anyone in the government, the pharmaceutical industry, the medical profession, or the media is willing to admit.

The Wisconsin Supreme Court has ruled that the ballot drop boxes utilized in the state during the 2020 election are unconstitutional under the state constitution. Notably, the court did not invalidate absentee ballots, but simply clarified that voters must either mail their completed ballots or return them personally to an election official’s office (including drop boxes that official may have instituted there). This is a major blow to the legitimacy of the 2020 election in a swing state which was critical to Biden’s victory. While the Democrats are bemoaning the ruling, it should not come as a surprise to any reasonable person. How can one vouch for the integrity of ballots left in a box on some random street corner? What’s to say it hasn’t been compromised? And it is not as though this undermines absentee voting. Wisconsin residents are still free to mail their ballot by regular USPS mail or to return it in person to an election official’s office. In fact, since these are sufficient means of safely returning a ballot during a pandemic, what reason was there to provision ballot drop boxes (beyond those on state government property) in the first place? What convenience or precaution did ballot drop boxes offer beyond those that are offered by returning ballots via postal mail or to a drop box at a state government office? It seems clear that general ballot drop boxes serve to, at best, only muddy the waters in a contentious election.

Americans’ trust in new media is at an all-time low, with only Democrats voicing strong faith in it. Is it any surprise, after an entire presidential term in which the media savaged the Republican president (deservedly and undeservedly) and backed the Democrats to the hilt, that no one but Democrats trusts the news? Since 2016, it has become clear to anyone with a shred of reasoning ability that the media, on the whole, spins any and every vaguely political news item in favor of the Democrats and against the Republicans. What is most telling is that independents seem to now see through this bias, with just over 1 in 3 trusting mass media (36%). And again, is anyone surprised? When inflation is at record highs, supplies of everything are short, and the economy is entering a recession even with businesses reopened and only Democrats to blame, why would independents trust a media which only lavishes praise on the Democrats? When 90% of Republicans and 64% of independents don’t trust the news, the conclusion that it is hopelessly biased toward the Democrats is inescapable.

A former general employed by the Defense Department has been suspended for exercising his First Amendment rights to criticize the First Lady, a clear violation of his rights. The left loves to condescendingly lecture that right that private companies have no legal obligation to preserve your First Amendment rights. This is largely true, case law is crystal clear that the government may not violate an American’s First Amendment rights—this is precisely the point of the First Amendment. This is a case in which the government is the employer, and therefor is bound by the First Amendment. Sacking military personnel over a personal slight against the nation’s leader or his family is undemocratic conduct befitting of dictators. And this is precisely the conduct that the left accused Trump of, and swore that Biden would never do because he has such high honor and integrity.  The left doesn’t get to claim that Biden and the Democrats aren’t petty, and willing to act undemocratically to act out their pettiness.

A group of activists is offering a bounty of $250 for every sighting of a conservative Supreme Court justice, endangering their lives casually in service of the left’s political agenda. To date, the left has only heckled Supreme Court justices in public. But to essentially establish a means of constantly monitoring opposition political figures is terrifyingly authoritarian. Ostensibly, the activist organizers intend to publicize the information they obtain via the bounty so that protesters can harass the justices—what’s the point of knowing where a justice is if the activists just sit on that information, or only dispatch the group’s insiders to the justice’s location? Protests rely chiefly on numbers, and the way to marshal the largest numbers is to post a justice’s location online and invite anyone and everyone to show up and shout them down. But what is to stop a violent leftist (or any violent and disturbed individual) from using this open-source intelligence to try to kill one of the justices? There has already been one attempt on the life of a conservative justice at his home, which is significantly better-protected than some offsite location. It is much harder to secure a location like a restaurant or store which a security team or its client does not own and control than the client’s home (which the client would open fully to the security detail to fortify). Thus, the activists are offering more viable opportunities to would-be assassins than they previously had trying to breach assail a justice at their home. And, like with all left-wing authoritarianism, it becomes clear for what it is when one considers the hypothetical reverse: imagine if even the most moderately right-leaning activists paid for intel on the location of left-leaning Supreme Court justices? The Democrats, the media, and celebrities would all condemn it as fascist, and the FBI would round up the activists within the week. But when the right is the target, it is merely shrugged off. This is what makes the left the true authoritarians and fascists. They believe they have the right to subject their enemies to any amount of physical danger, or inflict any amount of financial and/or reputational ruin, to pursue their agenda, but will tolerate not even the faintest peaceful rhetorical dissent from their enemies. Moreover, the left will gladly rely on radical street enforcers to intimidate and destroy their enemies. What else explains how it is that Antifa could literally seize and occupy portions of American cities, explicitly stating that they had wrested control away from the democratically elected city government, and not be aggressively arrested and prosecuted by law enforcement? Again, if a right-wing extremist group took over part of a city, they would be immediately branded as terrorists and opposed with the full force of the state—and RIGHTLY so in that case. This hounding and casual jeopardization of the conservative justices will not be the last or most brazen authoritarian act by the left. Rather, if not opposed by a strong and even-handed application of the law of our land, the left will gradually push the envelope until the nation either submits to them utterly or until the left’s vigilante shock troops gain de facto control of the streets of every major American city.

The majority of Democrat voters would prefer a candidate other than Biden to run for president in 2024, showing an extraordinary lack of faith in a sitting president by one’s own party. In the last 50 years, a sitting president has never lost a presidential primary election while running for a second term. Data from New Zealand (provided by Johns Hopkins) shows not only that the mRNA COVID “vaccine” is ineffective, but that there is an inverse relationship between vaccination rates and COVID case rates—and COVID death rates. New Zealand reached nearly 75% full vaccination by December 21, 2021. But despite this, by April 2, 2022 the new daily confirmed COVID deaths in New Zealand spiked to 19 TIMES the highest daily COVID death rate EVER recorded before the nation’s populace hit the 75% vaccination mark. Deaths have soared even higher, with new daily COVID deaths in New Zealand as of July 20, 2022 reaching 22 times their pre-COVID vaccine peak. The rate of new daily COVID cases in New Zealand is consistent with this stunning data on COVID deaths. Before the 75% vaccination mark on December 21, 2021, the highest daily case rate for COVID in New Zealand was just under 200 cases per day. By March of 2022, it was over 15,00 new cases per day, and is currently (as of July 20, 2022) over 8000 new cases per day. If the vaccine was so effective, this shouldn’t be possible, even when correcting for the fact that the dominant COVID strains are more infectious. It is now all but impossible to escape the conclusion that the COVID “vaccine” is utterly useless.

With Biden’s COVID diagnosis comes yet another instance of an mRNA “vaccine” apologist catching COVID. With an incipient recession and high inflation, America is at risk of stagflation, an economic state of affairs most economists consider to be the worst possible outcome (short of depression). The latest iteration of YouTube censorship comes to the aid of radical leftists by banning not a slur, but a useful and neutral term used to classify a child abuser. Also unlike the n-word, which has no non-offensive context, the word “groomer” has a de facto technical meaning which is not derogatory toward LGBT people: any individual who psychologically manipulates a child to make that child vulnerable to abuse (especially sexual abuse). YouTube’s latest censorship is NOT to remove the homophobic use of “groomer” but allow its technical use. Rather, YouTube is proscribing ALL use of “groomer”. Given the circumstances of this new ban, how is this anything other than politically motivated? And of course, YouTube would never ban a term used to vilify the right. That’s why YouTube is perfectly fine with people using words like “Nazi” and “fascist” against anyone for any reason (as long as the target isn’t on the left). Cities around the country can’t hire enough police officers to meet their staffing levels. Yes, law enforcement has always struggled to attract employees because of the long hours, low pay, and elevated danger inherent in the profession. But that has always been the case, and would not suddenly have an increased effect on recruitment. The one variable that IS different is public perception. Specifically, one very vocal minority of the public vociferously believes that all law enforcement should be disbanded. This in itself is immaterial, but these same people are the ones who call for officers to get prosecuted every time they use force in the line of duty, whether justifiably so or not. Why would anyone want to be a police officer if they are going to get arrested any time they use a weapon to protect themselves or the public? The same 9-year-old could also tell you what the effect of this law enforcement staffing shortage will be: higher crime. And yet the average leftist seems stunned that their neighborhoods are seeing elevated crime rates. Even leftists, one would imagine, do not want violence inflicted upon them (they are, of course, OK with perpetrating violence, as evidenced by Antifa operating completely unopposed in the Pacific Northwest). And yet their zealotry is stifling the recruitment of exactly the people best able to reduce that violence. They claim that “restorative justice” reduces crime, but there is no data on the scale of a major American city to back this up. Ask the 9-year-old a third time and they will corroborate this with intuition. What is more likely to reduce recidivism, making a criminal “restore” the harm they caused (essentially just apologize) and nothing more, or being locked behind bars for years? If that 9-year-old hit another kid on the playground, they’d be less likely to do it if they had a timeout than if they had to just say “sorry”. Funny enough, leftists seem to agree that the “restorative justice” they advocate doesn’t work, when judged by their actions. When a liberal prosecutor or DA assumes office, they don’t practice “restorative justice” but simply stop enforcing laws against theft, property damage, and certain kinds of use of a weapon. This, too, has had the result the 9-year-old could guess: rising rates of crime overall. Somehow our society has decided to let these radical deologue leftists, who don’t understand what the 9-year-old can reason out, call the shots.

The FBI under Democrat Biden raided the home of his political opponent, Trump, on arbitrary and inapplicable charges, the behavior of failed state tyrants. These are the same Democrats who screamed throughout the 2016 election that it is undemocratic and un-American to “jail political opponents”. And yet why would the FBI raid Trump’s home unless they intended to put him in jail? Once again, on a matter they claim to hold in the highest respect, the sacred defense of democracy, the Democrats have determined they deserve to enjoy a double-standard. Democratic norms are for Democrats, Republicans deserve no fair treatment. But the naked authoritarianism of the Democrats gets even more glaring. Let’s take the argument that they rejected when Trump made it about Clinton but which they now embrace against Trump: what if a highly placed political figure DID actually commit a crime? If we want to prosecute highly placed politicians, then, let’s look at the score. What is Trump now accused of (informally, as there have been no charges publicly released in connection with this raid)? Supposedly, it I that he removed intelligence from the White House improperly. However, he was still president when he did so, and by law, the president is an origin of classification, meaning he is allowed to declassify any piece of intelligence merely by doing so. By definition, his removal of these items from a classified environment while president makes them declassified under the law. You can dislike the law, but the law remains the law. By contrast, when Clinton maintained a State Department email server in her private residence, she broke the law. This is because the Secretary of State does not have the same classification authority as the president. What Clinton did is indisputably a crime, and far more dangerous to national security. Trump supposedly removed some paper documents, whereas Clinton housed all her State Department emails in her private residence, ON THE INTERNET, where any nation-state cyber actor could (and probably did) steal them. In that light, it makes a lot more sense how China has bested the US at every turn from Clinton’s tenure as Secretary of State up through now. So if we want to get fair about locking politicians up (IF), the Democrats should start with Clinton. The only other thing the Democrats supposedly have Trump on that could possibly justify this raid is his First Amendment-protected political speech—which the Supreme Court has long ruled has NO legal limit whatsoever—on January 6, 2021. With those ruled out, the only likely alternatives are that Biden sicked the FBI on Trump to keep him out of the 2024 presidential race by (a) intimidating him out of running or (b) going all the way and imprisoning Trump. This action by Biden is as anti-democratic as it gets. The first simply won’t happen. And if the second played out, it would trigger civil unrest the likes of which Americans could never dream up in their worst nightmares. That’s not my desire—I want peace—that’s just what any rational person would tell you would happen as a result. If Americans who cherish their civil liberties take a stand and oppose this with an overwhelming Democrat defeat at the ballot box, this will be the single stupidest political move they could have ever made (the stupidest of all time). If not, then America has lurched down the path to tyranny from which it will never recover.

More evidence has emerged showing that mRNA COVID “vaccine” manufacturers misled the public on the rigor of their testing and outright lied about the drug’s effectiveness. Scrutinizing claims by the mRNA jab manufacturers, insisting that they tested it on animals, reveals that they conducted animal testing and human testing simultaneously. The whole point of animal testing is to do so BEFORE human testing so that as much foreseeable harm to humans test subjects can be avoided as possible. So while it’s technically true that animal testing took place, the fact that it was concurrent with human testing is so utterly against the spirit of animal testing that they may as well have not bothered with animal testing at all. In the case of the AstraZeneca jab, it was tested on the laughably small number of 20 macaques, only 6 of which received an actual dose (rather than a placebo). In other words, it sure seems as though they tested on animals just to tick a regulatory box and satisfy skepticism from a casual line of questioning. More importantly, these details also illustrate that these pharma titans knew limitations of their drugs’ effectiveness and hid it from the public anyway. The animal study with the 20 macaques saw all 20 catch COVID… meaning that the “vaccine” did not stop the spread. The mRNA jab never stopped the spread at any point, and the drug companies knew this. Moreover, this was evident in their data, which they provided to the FDA, which means that the government ALSO knew this all along. And yet both the drug companies and the government lied, stating that the “vaccines” stopped the spread. The governments of many states and cities went so far as to impose “vaccine” mandates, with even Biden’s federal government attempting the same via OSHA. What kind of government of a free country is it that can claim it respects individual freedoms and then not only removing Americans’ medical autonomy, but do so on a pretext they know to be false? How can any government claim to respect freedom when it took away its citizens’ medical freedom on a lie, to “stop the spread” when it knew the drug they forced on American was incapable of stopping the spread?

There is an alarmingly strong correlation between the Pfizer mRNA COVID “vaccine” and miscarriages in pregnant women. Throughout the pandemic, pregnant women as a group have been among the most skeptical of the mRNA COVID immune therapy shots pushed by pharmaceutical giants and the government (namely Democrats). It seems they had good reason for this. Analysis of Pfizer trial data shows anywhere from 18% to 44% of pregnant women in their test data suffering a miscarriage. This compares with a miscarriage rate of around 1 in 4 normally for American women. How is this not cause for concern among medical professionals? In the past, if a drug coincided with this high of a rate of miscarriages, the FDA would immediately suspend its licensure, and possibly even pursue criminal prosecution or the manufacturers. Yet somehow, the government appears nonplussed by this data.

The Democrats, who have claimed the mantle of guardians of democracy, have used their dominance in one blue state to shut third-parties out of the gubernatorial ballot. In New York state, Democrats snuck provisions into a budget bill to precipitously increase the number of signatures required for a candidate to be allowed onto a state ballot. The threshold was raised so high so quickly that for the first time in nearly a century, there will be no third-party candidate on the ballot for New York governor. There is no other reason to raise the number of required signatures other than to try to keep certain candidates from running. And the Democrats better not dare claim the move was about election integrity or security, because they’ve spent the last 2 years not only insisting that the 2020 election was the most secure election of all time (so how could heightened security possibly be necessary?), but decrying any attempt to impose a verification process on voters (such as requiring an ID, as is typical in even the most leftist European countries) as racist. Moreover, if it were for election security, why hide it away in a budget bill where no one would find it? Why not proclaim it proudly as yet another step toward ensuring election integrity? The Democrats have no claim to the be party of democracy if they are intentionally shoving challengers off the ballot. In fact, few things are more authoritarian than manipulating election rules to exclude candidates from the electoral process. This is what tyrants like Putin do. How are the Democrats any different when it comes to elections?

The Democrats continue to bail out their political devotees and reward all the wrong personal, financial, and economic decisions by forgiving $10,000 of student debt to every student. This move is abysmally bad for a whole host of reasons. First, it punishes all the students who worked to put themselves through school. What do Biden and the Democrats have to say to these students who could have taken out a loan that would just be forgiven who instead traded years of sleep and seeing their friends and family to work to pay for school? This policy is of minimal help to the working poor that the Democrats claim were the intended recipients, but instead immensely buoys the upper-middle class (mostly white) suburbanites that make up the base of their party, and who don’t need it the decreased debt burden. Second, this measure rewards students for getting degrees that are of little to no utility in the modern US economy. If these students had obtained degrees in high-paying fields—high-paying because the economy has deemed these jobs of greater benefit to overall economic growth—they would not need loan forgiveness because they would have gotten a job that pays down their debt. All this does is signal to Millennial and Gen Z Democrat cultists that they should feel uninhibited to pursue degrees in Gender Studies, Theater, and the like, resulting in Americans who generate no economic value. Third, this will actually result in reduced access to higher education for young Americans. Just like with health care (i.e. Obamacare), the Democrats are either too self-interested or too inept to actually reduce the cost of the product or service being obtained, instead dispensing a one-time treatment to the symptom. Bankers aren’t stupid. Now that they know that the student loans they dispense can just evaporate at any moment, they’ll just give out fewer loans. Biden apologists may counter that this just means that university tuition will have to respond to decreased loan availability by dropping prices. Maybe, but American universities are already so highly coveted that they’re more likely to keep their prices high and just admit more foreign students. If a university already has to turn away the majority of applicants then what reason is there to lower their tuition? And if the number of American students who can afford tuition declines, there is a nearly inexhaustible supply of wealthy foreign students who will gladly take their place. Biden’s loan cancellation will truly have the effect of shifting American universities to becoming social clubs for the progeny of the global elite. Finally, by handing out what amounts to free money, the Democrats are back to buy votes, this time to college students. To be more accurate, this move is about generating new votes. It is already well-established that American universities are essentially leftist indoctrination operations beneath a thin veil of an educational institution. If the Democrats signal that young Americans’ “education” at these establishments will be free, the university system will absorb more young Americans and churn out more leftist converts. This will catalyze the presently ongoing operation to create generation after generation of zealous, sheepish Democrat voters. This may be one round of loan forgiveness for students who have already graduated, but the trend line on in mainstream left US politics is to give more and more handouts to more and more groups. Viewed rationally from all angles, all this policy does is set our economy up for long-term decline and generate more voters for the Democrats.

The Democrats are practicing more psychological projection by labeling Republicans as “semi-fascist”. The Democrats have the audacity to call Republicans fascists when the Democrats are the ones who police what Americans can and can’t say (in coordination with their corporate masters in Big Tech), the ones who hides the truth (again, via Big Tech) that harms their electoral standing, the ones who destroyed small businesses with years of forced closures and transferred more wealth to the elites than ever before in world history, the ones who let their street enforcers in Anitfa and the violent fringe of BLM to burn and beat with impunity, and the ones who used every coercive instrument in their power in the public and private sector to force Americans to take an ineffective experimental mRNA immunotherapy to combat a disease with a minuscule fatality rate (outside of a small number of certain high-risk groups). Meanwhile, the supposedly divisive Republican party is building up more support with racial minorities, women, and the middle and lower class than ever before, as evidenced by Trump’s increased share of votes from all of these groups from 2016 to 2020. Republicans didn’t censor speech in the 4 years Trump was president, allowing the left to throw as many tantrums as they wanted. The Republicans didn’t impose ineffectual stay-at-home orders that laid waste to American small businesses, the lifeblood of the economy. The Republicans never forced anyone to take a drug against their will, holding their livelihood hostage to do so. The main argument that Democrats trot out to ascribe fascism to the Republicans is the January 6 Riot. But this sad episode was far from an insurrection, as the rioters did not kill a single civil servant or agent of the state when it was easily within their power to do so on numbers alone (to say nothing of the weapons they could have brought to bear). January 6 was a shameful riot for which all participants who broke the law should be prosecuted. But it was no coup: it was overwhelmingly unarmed, aimless, directionless, and unmotivated. Did this change the outcome of the election? It’s extremely difficult to know at this point. But what is certain is that election law was knowingly disregarded, which casts doubt on the outcome. So when we look at the whole score, who are the real fascists?

Zuckerberg admits that the FBI after a fashion told Facebook to censor stories that were critical of Biden. In an interview with Rogan, Zukerberg stated that although the FBI did not instruct Facebook to censor the Hunter Biden laptop story specifically, the FBI warned that a damaging piece of “disinformation” was going to be imminently released. Why would the FBI warn Facebook about disinformation if it did not intend for Facebook to censor it? It is doubtful that the FBI issues warnings like this for no reason, just to keep social media platforms informed and leave them to respond as they choose. The tacit understanding is that Facebook was to suppress whatever this “disinformation” was. And how fortunate for Biden that the Hunter Biden laptop story emerged after the FBI implied that Facebook should censor stories. And to those Democrat apologists who insist that the FBI is guarding against ALL forms of disinformation, does any thinking person actually believe for a moment that the FBI would have advised or assisted in suppressing disinformation that harms Trump? The whole notion that Trump colluded with Russia in 2016 is, in fact, disinformation, in that it is not supported by any substantial factual evidence. This is the clearest case yet of the government entities with a left slant using their power to influence the election. If this played out in any other nation, Americans would rightly regard this as a sign of corruption. But in America, the left doesn’t care if the government interferes in an election as long as their side benefits. What is more anti-democratic than that?

Leftists at the highest levels of the scientific community are now openly declaring that they won’t publish studies that contradict the left’s political agenda. The supposedly pro-science left has now decreed that they will not publish any research which could be taken to imply and differences in ability or outcome between different social groups. This is just patently absurd, not only because some groups very plainly enjoy different outcomes than others, but because the cause of equality they profess to support must understand these realities to have any chance to ensuring the fair outcomes they preach. How can a political movement that wants fairness not want to understand how outcomes are distributed? The journal in question, Nature, did state that it sought to study unequal outcomes that it deems to be caused by discrimination, but nothing else—it will not consider cultural, genetic, neurological, or sexual dimorphic differences as causes of unequal outcomes. As the Quillette critique’s author points out, this leftist virtue signaling paean would strike studies which establish the biological reality that the average adult (XY chromosome-having) male is stronger that the average adult (XX chromosome-having) female. The author also astutely notes that the left would not have tolerated this open declaration of censorship had the shoe been on the other foot, and the journal had vowed to censor anything that doesn’t adhere to the conservative moral worldview. Moreover, if it is empirically evident that social groups are equal, then why are they so concerned about censoring studies to the contrary? If there’s proof that everyone is equal, shouldn’t the left be able to be confident that the science is on their side and that the evidence can defeat counter-claims? But the outcomes that groups enjoy IS sometimes determined by differences in culture, genetics, neurochemistry, and sex. This is an objective fact. The nature and distribution of these varied outcomes as they relate to culture, genetics, neurochemistry, and sex are yet to be fully understood. It has traditionally been science’s task to understand them. The left has declared that, as long as it has control of the scientific establishment, it has no interest in discovering these differences. How is what the American/Western left doing in the journal Nature different from the Nazi pseudoscientific establishment warping science to reinforce its agenda?

New data released by the American Heart Association reveals that men under 40 are at a higher risk of myocarditis from the COVID mRNA “vaccines” than from a case of COVID itself. This is another nail in the coffin for the claim that the mRNA immune therapy shots for COVID are safe. It somehow wasn’t convincing enough that reports to the VAERS database were at an all-time high. Now enough data has been released that the case is self-evidently made that these shots are not as safe as advertised. The real science shows that people have every reason to be hesitant about taking the shots, and to make their own choice for their own body. That the government acts as though it did not have data indicating this much risk shows either that it is supremely incompetent, or supremely corrupt. At th barest of bare minimums, the Biden administration and every state and city administration that imposed “vaccine” mandates owes their citizens an apology for forcing this dangerous treatment on them. It is inescapable now how misguided this attempted (and, in some cases, successful) coercion was, and how dubious the benefit of the mRNA treatment is.

California lawmakers are working to pass a law that would criminalize the dissemination of “medical disinformation”, ensuring that the public health bureaucrats get to mandate what medical treatments you may, may not, or must take. Any attempt by the government to criminalize certain forms of speech should be viewed with extreme skepticism at the very least. But given the radical shifts in public health guidance throughout the course of the pandemic, not to mention the glaring contradictions between public health pronouncements and the data-driven real science, this attempt at speech control should be viewed as utterly suspect. Recall that in the roughly 2 years of the pandemic public health officials have flip-flopped on the efficacy of masks, the transmissibility of COVID between vaccinated individuals, and the origins of virus itself. If these supposedly trustworthy expert institutions got all of this basic facts wrong, what business does the government have prosecuting people for medical claims they make? This legislation is ripe for abuse—imagine how much total and inescapable a “vaccine” mandate could be if anyone who questioned the vaccine was prosecuted and imprisoned? The entire principle of bodily autonomy would utterly collapse. But more than any pernicious impact on bodily autonomy, a “disinformation” law throws the door wide open for censorship. The pretext for regulating speech on medical treatment is “public safety”. Once a law which allows censorship for the sake of public safety takes hold, it sets a precedent permitting censorship of any speech as long as it can be tangentially linked to some public safety or national security excuse. The government would easily be able to warp any censorship justification to superficially pertain to public safety. How can anyone argue that the Democrats are not the most authoritarian force in present day American politics when they propose laws such as this?

Biden doubled down labeling the vast majority of Republicans as a “threat to democracy”. This vilification of Democrats’ political opponents hinges on the fact that a very small minority of them participated in a riot at the Capitol Building (shameful as it certainly was) which only the delusional could seriously regard as a “coup”, resulting in 5 fatalities all among the rioters themselves. Which of these is the REAL threat to the safety and freedom of our society? The more likely rationale for smearing Trump supporters as fascists is that the Democrats know they can’t defeat him in a fair electoral contest, and so are trying to disqualify him and sabotage his movement in advance. But again, who are the real terrorists: the 2 convicted of an FBI-fabricated plot to kidnap a Democrat governor, or the hundreds of Antifa street thugs setting fire to government buildings, wresting control of city streets away from the legitimate municipal government, and starting firefights in the streets? If Biden wants to find the real authoritarians, he need only look to his Democrat colleagues and the street rabble they allow to run rampant in cities across the nation.

Pfizer’s new COVID pill is so ineffective that even the docile, subservient liberal media is starting to question its effectiveness. Despite assurances throughout that pandemic that Americans would not be expected to keep getting more COVID shots, public health figures are now saying that annual COVID booster shots will become the norm. This goes to show that these self-appointed experts are completely bankrupt of credibility. According to Bannon, 35 high-level Trump allies have had their homes raided by the FBI. This statement, of course, should be taken with a grain of salt, as Bannon is not the most trustworthy individual. If this is true, though, it would mark a serious escalation in the Democrats’ persecution of their political opponents. Democrats in the Senate are attempting to expand the reach of their censorship to stifle crisis pregnancy centers, which merely attempt to counsel pregnant women without offering abortions. Violent crime continues to rise across the nation, predominantly in multi-generational Democrat-stronghold cities. The Democrats and their faithful media servants are using the anniversary of the 9/11 tragedy to make veiled insinuations that their political opponents on the right are a threat of the same degree and character as the hijackers who killed more than 3000 Americans 21 years ago. If one were to ask Harris or the Democrats’ media thralls if Antifa was part of this “threat from within”, they would almost certainly say “no” despite the fact that Antifa—and not ANY right-wing entity—is the only group in the last 10 years to literally seize control of blocks of multiple American cities from their lawfully elected governments. 4 out of 5 Democrats view democratically elected Trump and his Republican allies, the core of the entire Republican party, as a threat to democracy in America. The January 6 Riot, shameful as it was, is merely a pretext for Democrats to ban the Republican party, fulfilling their authoritarian project as the so many left-wing tyrannies before them have. Every American should see the prevalence of this belief for how extraordinarily dangerous it is.

When illegal migrants were flooding through the nation’s southern border and straining the (mainly Republican-voting) communities in that area, the left extended no help and merely stated that America should take in every illegal migrant, but now that illegal migrants are being relocated to their wealthy communities, the left is in an uproar that THEY should be made to accommodate the migrants. For decades, the left cared nothing for the plight of border communities as their resources were stretched to the breaking point. Instead, the left stubbornly advanced its open border policy and insisted that border communities just deal with it. But now that southern states are sharing the load, which until now rested solely on those border communities, with the same affluent leftists who pushed the policy that caused the tidal wave of illegal migrants, these leftists are pitching a fit. To the left, it is intolerable that they as the ones who threw open our borders should have to personally accommodate the people who came through those open borders. It doesn’t get more hypocritical than that. Ideological consistency demands that anyone who wants open borders should be prepared to personally house and feed the people who immigrate to our country as a result. And in the case of migrants being flown to Martha’s Vineyard, one of the most affluent communities in the world, the residents there have more than enough means of putting their money where their mouth is. And yet they childishly refuse, and they refuse to admit they don’t practice what they preach. They believe that the consequences of their actions are for others to suffer, and not for themselves. This is bad enough in itself, but then they have the audacity to liken southern states’ efforts to even out the load of illegal migrants to the acts of the Nazis. Put more bluntly, the left is likening transporting migrants to the wealthiest, safest, most exclusive communities in the world to the Holocaust’s forced relocation of the Jews to concentration camps. How twisted does your worldview have to be to make such an absurd and tasteless comparison? Only the left has a worldview this twisted.

On top of the previously noted hypocrisy on the part of the left in complaining that THEY now have to take care of the illegal migrants they made southern (mostly Republican) states take care of for the whole span of their open border policy, now the left is trying to legally coerce these states into stopping. To appreciate the staggering scope of this hypocrisy, here is how the consequences of the left’s immigration policies played out. First, the left pursued a policy, for more than a decade, in which they allowed any illegal migrant crossing into the US to remain in the country without consequence. Second, throughout that time, the left offered no help when communities on the border asked for help dealing with the economic consequences of letting untold numbers of new people flow into their communities. Third, when the states containing these border communities sent a token number of illegal migrants to the affluent leftist communities that lobbied to let these migrants in, these leftist communities vocally protested. And now fourth, the left is trying to force southern states to stop sending affluent leftists communities the illegal migrants that the left let in (which are overwhelming communities in southern states). This latest chapter in the radical left immigration policy saga goes to show that the left never had any compassion for illegal migrants. The left only let these migrants in when said migrants stayed out of sight and imposed no negative consequences on them. As soon as these leftists are in a position to directly help the migrants they claim to stand for, they can’t wriggle out of it fast enough. Not only that, but the left has the audacity to punish southern states for trying to share the load of illegal migrants with the rest of the country.

Despite Democrats’ vocal claims to want to act to stop mass shootings, especially in schools, Democrats refuse to so much as voice their arguments against a bill which funds the staffing of additional police officers and mental health professionals in schools. Not only do most Democrats, particularly those who are most adamantly in favor of gun control, refuse to vote for legislation which provides more security and mental health resources to students, but they won’t so much as state their reasons for rejecting the legislation. Rather than make strides to prevent mass shootings by providing mental health treatment options dissuading students from lashing out, or resisting mass shootings with armed police officers, the Democrats are only interested in trying to limit legal access to firearms as much as possible. They are hell-bent on this approach despite the fact that it is demonstrably useless, as seen in every Democrats stronghold city where guns are nearly impossible for anyone to get and yet somehow shootings happen daily. Anyone who wants to kill the innocent will find a way to obtain the tools for doing so. The law will rarely stop them. The Democrats would rather double down on this failed approach than reduce the desire to kill in troubled youth or oppose force with force. How does this make any sense? Even if the Democrats refuse to abandon gun control, why not supplement it with more mental health professionals and law enforcement officers, especially when Republicans are willing to embrace this tactic? These actions by the Democrats are not the actions of leaders who sincerely wish to stop bloodshed—if that was the Democrats’ goal, they would gladly back this legislation and then decide whether to pursue gun control further. So what is the true aim of the Democrats? It seems as though it is to allow violent crime to run rampant to justify more security powers for themselves.

More illegal immigrants have come to the US border this year than ever before, and the year isn’t even over yet. Given this clear evidence, how can anyone argue that the Democrats are not the party of open borders? The radicals in the party are at least open about this policy goal. But the Democrats on the whole pretend to favor a compromise wherein they grant amnesty to illegal migrants already settled here while tightening border enforcement. There is no way that all 2 million of these border crossers were apprehended and either detained or sent back—this would simply be logistically impossible, as the US does not have the resources. So the only remaining possibility is that some proportion of these 2 million illegal migrants were allowed to simply enter the country unopposed. In this way, the Democrats get to pursue their real agenda of letting anyone into our country who desires it, without any regard for national security, while still maintaining the pretense that they are trying to enforce immigration law in the face of immense flows of people.
