Indeed, the fact that record numbers of people have attempted to cross into the US shows that there is a clear perception that Biden will let anyone in who wants in—if these migrants didn’t sincerely believe that, they wouldn’t risk their lives to attempt the dangerous crossing.

An organization of LGBT individuals working to prevent child abuse had their PayPal and Venmo accounts shut down purely because they challenge the prevailing leftist radical progressive sexual identity agenda. The left’s radical but relentless vanguard has been exposed repeatedly—at school board meetings, reports in conservative news outlets, and leaks on social media—for introducing sexually mature content and ideas to minors and pushing them them toward embracing LGBT identities (particularly transgender identities). This effort takes many forms: allowing books with pornagraphic content in school libraries (e.g. Gender Queer by Maia Kobabe), putting on erotic dance performances (under the pretext of an LGBT inclusivity event) involving minors in schools, hosting summer camps for minors featuring erotic subject matter, and overall permitting the free rein of sex-related topics in the classroom (outside the bounds of the standard sex ed curriculum). Gays Against Groomers is a group of LGBT individuals who seek to put a stop to this initiative by the left, particularly since it creates an undeservedly negative perception of the LGBT community as a whole, most of whom seek only to live their lives without bothering anyone like everyone else. How is a group with a mission such as this, preventing the exposure of minors to sexually mature material, objectionable to anyone in any way? Who has the nerve to argue that this is wrong? And yet this group was kneecapped from accepting donations by two of the biggest online payment processors. What could possibly be the justification for this? It seems as though the answer is that the left is sore that this push to expose minors to sexual content has been succinctly and pointedly distilled into the term “groomer”, and the term has been allowed to spread like wildfire. If “groomer” didn’t apply to what the radical left is doing, then what need would they have to prevent anyone from uttering the term—they could simply brush it off and say “that’s an absurd and groundless accusation, with no facts to back it up”. But the left didn’t do that. Instead, the backlash was savage. This is the behavior of someone who is guilty. Everyone knows that if you accuse a person of something and they react with histrionics and attempt to silence you (rather than rationally disputing the allegation with counter-facts), that is almost the surest sign they’re guilty. This is exactly the case with the left’s hissy fit about being called “groomers”. The deplatforming of Gays Against Groomers is material proof of the existence of this hissy fit.

US home sales decreased for the 7th consecutive month, a clear sign of an ailing economy. If Americans aren’t buying homes, they aren’t building wealth or securing a middle class standard of living. After more than a year of smearing Gaetz as a pedophile prior to any charges being filed, the Justice Department is now reportedly no longer pursuing such prosecution against Gaetz. This is precisely the in-group privileges versus out-group persecution that is the hallmark of authoritarianism, especially since the press and every major tech platform snaps into line with whatever the Democrats pronounce. This pairing of the pro-Democrat double-standard with the de facto Democrat colonization of the media and the Internet that makes this vein of authoritarianism truly insidious.

The left insists that no one would ever adopt an LGBT identity as a fad, and yet a study shows that more than 1 in every 3 liberal arts students identifies as LGBT. Is the left seriously prepared to argue that 1 in 3 people are LGBT in their heart of hearts, and that none of those people are just trying to jump on the bandwagon that the left itself popularized and promoted? The left has spent the last few years heaping praise on LGBT people and elevating them to a higher social status in left circles. And considering that the college-age demographic (Gen Z) is well-known to be conformist and desperate for attention and validation from their peers, is the left seriously going to pretend that not a single one of these people is just posing as LGBT for the attention? While it is undoubtedly true that America is more accepting of LGBT people than it has ever been, there is no way that this is the reason for the explosion in LGBT identification—the left’s narrative, that 1 in 3 Americans have always been LGBT but only NOW they feel safe enough to come out, is statistically impossible. Our society would literally have collapsed if 1 in 3 people were forced to integrate into a society which (until 10 years ago) only officially sanctioned heterosexual relationships. Same-sex marriage was legalized 10 years ago, which would have been the most likely point in time to see a bump in LGBT identification due to widespread acceptance. What we are seeing now is Gen Z sheeple glomming onto a fad. Ironically, the same people who decry homophobia engage in the most homophobic possible behavior: trivializing LGBT identities by treating them as a costume to be worn to win empty praise from their peers.

While trying to push the latest iteration of the COVID mRNA “vaccine”, a study from a top-tier medical school unintentionally suggests that the current strain of COVID is far weaker than previous ones. A paper form Yale estimates that 90,000 American lives could be saved by wide adoption of the latest booster shot, which has supposedly been retooled to the mRNA sequence of the Omicron variant. However, when compared to the 1 million Americans who died from COVID to this point, the prospective death toll of not distributing the shot is not even 10% of that. To further put these numbers into proper context, the fatality rate from COVID was already a fraction of a percent. So the fact that the projected deaths from not taking the new boosters is 1/10 of less than a percent strongly suggests that COVID is nothing to worry about for most Americans at this point. And yet in spite of this, the left-leaning elite establishment is still pushing the COVID shots anyway. No matter, to them, that the shot is so ineffective that more vaccinated people are testing positive for COVID than unvaccinated, according to data from Walgreens. No matter, to them, that Biden declared the pandemic to be over. In spire of all of this, the public health establishment (which skews left politically) is still angling to get more Americans to take an ineffective vaccine to guard against a mild viral infection. Why? The explanation which is more likely—more likely than that they are investing immense time and effort to fighting a virus which poses little risk to most people—is that the public health institutions and government is in bed with the pharmaceutical industry. Pharma giants fund a not-insignificant proportion of the FDA’s budget, and fund a staggering number of research institutions. In return for being showered with cash, these organizations push the pharmaceutical industry’s products even when there is little sense in it. How can we trust these people to look out for our well-being when they so willingly serve corporations over patients?

Biden warns that the world is the closest to nuclear war since the Cuban Missile Crisis, as though this reality is not primarily his fault. As soon as the 2016 election made it apparent that Trump would lead the country, the left wailed that Trump would lead us to a nuclear war. And yet under his presidency, America was further from nuclear annihilation than under Obama and certainly than under Biden. The world has reached this precipice because Biden has the audacity to poke Russia on what Russia has stated is its vital national security interest. Whether Ukraine is, in fact, a vital national security interest to Russia is irrelevant: what matters is that Russia has stated, numerous times consistently for decades, that this is the case, so we can assume they will act accordingly. As stated here before, Russia has declared that they will not tolerate the absorption of Ukraine into NATO or the Western European sphere, and they demonstrated the seriousness of their resolve in the annexation of Crimea in 2014. Yet Biden decided to push Russia anyway, caring little for the fact that Ukraine would pay the price for his bravado. Then when hostilities inevitably broke out as a result of Biden’s posturing, the Biden administration had the further audacity to funnel arms and intelligence to Ukraine to field against Russia without making the slightest attempt to hide it. In other words, Biden made it clear to Russia that we are at war with it by proxy, at war in a conflict Russia regards as a matter of national life and death. Any 9-year-old who has gotten into playground fights could tell you that Russia would respond the way they did, and yet Biden pushed matters anyway. So after backing Russia into a corner, Biden dares to complain that the specter of nuclear war is looming? America could have avoided this by (1) leaving well enough alone by allowing a pro-Western government in Ukraine but refusing to allow them into the EU or NATO, or failing that (2) letting Ukraine fight Russia alone. Instead, Biden elected to make the most dangerous possible move, and then can’t understand how we got here. How is it that the left half of the country isn’t completely terrified that such a man leads the nation? Every single American should be alarmed by this, and no American who supported Biden has any right to criticize Trump’s foreign policy when he maintained the status quo and even made strides toward further stabilization (e.g. by paving the way to Saudi Arabian normalization of relations with Israel).

The left criticized Trump’s children (fairly) for unscrupulous business practices and insisted that their candidates’ families met a higher ethical standard, and yet now Hunter Biden’s conduct has become so egregious that Biden’s own federal government is investigating him for tax fraud. Anyone who has read objective reporting for the past many years knows that Hunter Biden conducts himself with no ethics whatsoever. And yet in spite of this the left still insists that the Bidens are honorable people, and nowhere near as slimy as the Trumps. Now the left can’t hide from the truth anymore. The worst thing you can do as the family member of a public servant is to avoid bearing your share of civic responsibility in this country: not paying taxes, not serving for jury duty, and other pillars of our democracy. Hunter Biden has proven, on numerous occasions long before the 2020 election, that he has no allegiance to the United States, as he has accepted millions of dollars from companies closely tied to foreign governments. Yet the left did not lose a wink of sleep over this. They didn’t even entertain the thought of putting up a candidate with higher ethical standards than Biden (they must have at least ONE politician who fits the bill). The Democrats now have no right to accuse any Republican of ethical failings when their own are at least as grave.

After receiving barely a few thousand migrants from Texas, the tiniest fraction of the number Texas itself has to handle every year, New York City declared a state of emergency over their supposed “migrant crisis”. As previously noted, the US has counted 2 million illegal migrants this year alone. This means that Texas has easily had to process hundreds of thousands of migrants every year for decades (recall that Bush attempted to address immigration in the early 2000s). Texas and the other border states face much more acute crisis than New York City, and yet neither New York nor any of the other perma-Democrat states expressed any sympathy for the border states facing waves of migrants. It’s also pretty hypocritical of New York to brush off the migrant influx at first and brag about how welcome migrants are to then turn around and call the incoming migrants an “emergency”. Isn’t that the same as saying they aren’t welcome? If incoming migrants lead to an emergency, and emergencies are viewed as undesirable, then the state absorbing these incoming migrants can be said to not want incoming migrants. It just goes to show how the Democrats are insincere about all the compassion they profess to have. The compassion ends as soon as it becomes inconvenient to the left. They wanted migrants, so they have no business complaining now that they have migrants aplenty.

When Trump moved to ban Chinese telecom and computer manufacturers from the US, the Democrats condemned him as a racist, but when Biden does the same thing, one hears not a peep from the Democrats. The Democrats have no principles and no sense of shame: they will embrace any argument, in bad faith, that will discredit and slander their opponents, but then will feel utterly uninhibited from doing exactly that which they condemned. The Democrats are especially egregious in regards to their beliefs on race: they claim to be the champions of racial justice, yet they are willing to do that which they called racist not 4 years ago. It shows how little the Democrats actually care for improving race relations in this country. In fact, it makes the Democrats more racist: what could possibly be more racist than the way the Democrats use race as a prop for political grandstanding?

The Democrats still have no handle on the economy, as runaway inflation continues. The Democrats have had months to sort out the inflation problem and they have not come up with anything with the potential for modest progress. How can anyone possibly argue that the Democrats have any idea of how to run the economy if the Democrats even fall short on the pathetic anti-inflation plans they DID come up with? Not only are their plans inadequate, but they can’t even succeed at THOSE.

Yet another economic indicator, mortgage rates at 20-year highs, shows that the Democrats are mismanaging the economy at epic proportions. The Democrats campaigned on delivering to the American people a healthier, more prosperous economy than Trump. And they campaigned during COVID, meaning they were already prepared to account for the setbacks presented by the pandemic. And yet every economic measure that comes out cements the fact that the Democrats are destroying the economy with their incompetence. And they have no excuse because, as Biden himself said, the pandemic is over. They can’t say COVID is setting them back because COVID is no longer an emergency. They talked a big game, they have no more excuses, and now they can’t deliver.

The companies that manufactured the ineffective COVID gene therapies are now boasting that they will be able to develop mRNA technology to cure cancer. How does BioNTech think that their track record with the COVID jab should inspire any confidence in anyone that they can tackle cancer? They produced a shot that they claimed would stop the spread of COVID and would prevent patients from developing a case of COVID. The evidence is now clear that the mRNA shots don’t stop the spread, and they don’t stop you from catching COVID (as data from Walgreens shows that the vaccinated test positive for COVID at a higher rate than the unvaccinated). There’s not even any proof that the “vaccine” reduces the severity of COVID, many vaccinated patients have gotten seriously ill, been hospitalized, and have died from COVID. So the mRNA gene therapy is a failure on all fronts: it does nothing an effective vaccine should be expected to do. And now they want us to believe that their vaccine was such a success that we should expect them to take the same technology and eventually defeat cancer? The pharma companies also clearly think we’re the stupidest people imaginable, because they talk about how long mRNA has been tested, yest this does not line up with their claims to this point even slightly. When the mRNA COVID jab manufacturers announced their product, they made one of two claims that don’t stand up to critical reasoning. One, they insisted that it was a brand new product and that testing had to be expedited to combat the pandemic, which contradicts the claim that mRNA has has years of testing. Alternatively, two, they promised that mRNA was somehow safe because it had been tested for decades but yet was somehow never approved for human use until conveniently right as a global pandemic started. How does any thinking person believe that the “vaccine” was safe if it had gone decades without approval but then was suddenly approved when the US government was so desperate to fight COVID that they were willing to approve almost anything as long as it didn’t kill more people than COVID? So what is it, drug companies? Is this tech brand new (and ineffective), making it too nascent to claim has promise against cancer? Or is this tech old and questionable because it took a global pandemic to be approved after decades of failed testing? Either way, clearly no one with any power to hold big pharma accountable—namely journalists (mostly Democrat supporters) or government officials (mostly Democrats as of this article’s publication)—because these companies went from duping all billions of patients by pushing an ineffective treatment to trying to sell us all another lie. But why would the Democrats and their faithful servants do anything to stop this when they take billions of dollars from these very same pharma companies? It could well be that pharma-funded Republicans would do no better. But then again, it’s the Democrats that profess to be the party of “the science”—for such believers in science, they sure don’t seem to want to follow the data here.

The Democrats repeatedly claimed that Trump would start a nuclear war, and yet intelligence analysts are now putting the chance of nuclear war as high as 25%, the highest it has likely every been (including during the Cuban Missile Crisis). Isn’t it funny how the Democrats (Biden in particular) are guilty of all the things they accused Trump of? How on Earth can the Democrats claim to pursue responsible foreign policy when they are bringing the world the closest it has ever been to nuclear annihilation because of their delusion that Russia is a global menace?...which they assure us has nothing to do with their claim that Russia stole the 2016 election for Trump... but somehow they also claim that it’s only the Republicans who allege any election was ever stolen (and that they CERTAINLY have never done so). The Democrats also love to deny the fact that their highest leadership, namely the Bidens, take enormous sums of money from Ukraine. So, when we tally up the score, we see that the Democrats are pushing the world to the edge of nuclear oblivion all so that the Bidens can keep getting bought by corrupt Ukrainian businessmen and so that they can get revenge on Russia for stealing the 2016 election for Trump, all while denying they think the 2016 election was stolen (and condemning the Republicans for daring to suggest 2020 was stolen for Biden). The Democrats have proven, by the actions they took openly for all the world to see, that they are complete lunatics.

While intelligence analysts warn that the world is closer to nuclear war than it has ever been in human history, Biden is out of the White House campaigning for fellow Democrats in a state that always votes Democrat (i.e. his campaign appearance is completely meaningless). The Democrats constantly lambasted Trump for golfing so often (which, to give them credit, was a fair criticism), but yet now when the world is on the precipice of the extinction of the human species, which the Democrats THEMSELVES caused, their president is out wasting his time instead of governing. Anyone who supports the Democrats is never allowed to criticize Republicans for inattentiveness to their duty ever again, considering how negligent they are and how much is at stake. Never.

Democrats are so out of touch on the hardships that ordinary Americans face that they are stunned that they are polling poorly after barely campaigning on the economy. How inept does a party have to be to hold power during an economic downturn, not campaign on the economic policy, let their opponents extensively campaign on how bad the economy is and how they have a plan to fix it, and then be shocked when they aren’t projected to do well against the opponents? A 9-year-old could tell you that these are the kind of people who don’t seem at all qualified to be in charge of the largest economy in the world. And yet the Democrats themselves don’t think they need to convince anyone they have a more refined plan for the economy. On top of that, with their campaign strategy being what it is, how is it that the Democrats can make ANY claim to be on the side of poor and working class Americans? These are the people who are most vulnerable to economic downturns. The elite clientele that the Democrats attract cant weather limping economies—they just pay more for things and grumble. In essence, then, the Democrats are too stupid or too arrogant to address the issue of most concern to the groups they claim to fight for the hardest: the middle- and low-income classes.

China is accelerating its timetable for conquering Taiwan coincidentally as the US government shows itself to be feebler and feebler. What’s more likely, that this rapid pivot toward a Chinese invasion of Taiwan—something they have held off on doing for 70 years—during the Biden presidency is pure happenstance, or that they see an extraordinarily ripe opportunity posed by American foreign policy ineptitude. Does anyone seriously think that America’s disastrously botched withdrawal from Afghanistan and its inability to deter Russian aggression in Ukraine didn’t signal to Beijing that they have a uniquely promising shot on Taiwan? And how can any thinking person argue that Biden’s foreign policy is superior to Trump’s? Russia made no moves on Ukraine under Trump. In fact, Trump signed sanctions against Russia into law, and advised Germany to wean itself off of Russian petroleum products, to which the Germans literally laughed in his face. I doubt they’re laughing now, with winter approaching and skyrocketing heating fuel costs. Meanwhile, Russia began its annexation of Ukrainian territory under Obama, and continued it to its present intensity under Biden. Trump, though clumsily so, also pushed back on China’s maritime incursions into foreign territorial waters far more than Biden has dared to do (though credit to Pelosi for not backing down from visiting Taiwan). So is it just 16 years of coincidence that China has been aggressive while Democrats were president and reserved while Republicans were president, or is it that Democrats are extraordinarily incompetent on foreign policy?

Biden is depleting our Strategic Petroleum Reserve by another 15 million barrels right as we are at the highest risk of outright war with a near-peer power since the Cold War. How stupid do you have to be to reduce our military fuel stockpile days after intelligence analysts say we’re the closest to war with one of the world’s top conventional militaries that we’ve ever been? And why is Biden doing this? All because his party was too inept to do anything to fix the economy, and now they’re at such a high risk of being crushed in the midterm election that he is scrambling to lower gas prices and fool Americans into thinking the Democrats have any idea what they’re doing with the economy. Democrats would only be too happy to smugly say the same if the shoe was on the other foot and it was Trump dipping into our oil reserves to help his party out. Aren’t the Democrats also the party that believes we all need to switch to electric cars ASAP and every ounce of oil burned is inching us closer to a climate apocalypse? So why is Biden giving America more oil? This is one of hundreds of other data points that show that the Democrats stand for nothing, and will do anything to get elected. They have no principles, no ethics, and no consistency. They are hypocrites of the highest order. Worse, they are backing America into a corner when our place in the world is under the greatest threat in generations, because they’re too stupid and greedy to know better.

The Democrats, who claim to be the devoted champions of  “antiracism” and “people of color”, are currently deathly afraid that they won’t win enough of the non-white vote in the upcoming midterm election. In fact, a major component of Democrat campaigning is screaming and crying about how everyone who disagrees with them is racist. So how do they explain the rapid departure of non-white voters from their support base? If the Republicans are so racist, how come more and more racial minorities are supporting the Republicans? To continue to maintain that Republicans are so racist would require Democrats to accuse these racial minority voters of being too stupid to see the supposed blatant racism of the Republicans. So what is it, Democrats: are racial minorities who don’t support you too stupid to see racism, or are the Republicans (as a whole) just actually not racist? It should be stated for the sake of clarity that there is no merit to the argument that non-white voters are any less intelligent or discerning. Therefore, the only rational explanation is that these voters simply don’t see the Republicans as racist. What they likely see in the Republicans is a group that is ACTUALLY concerned with their well-being by addressing economic issues. When are the Democrats going to admit that their accusations of racism are just empty political posturing and actually pursue policy?

Despite the fact that the pandemic is “over”, enrollment at institutions of higher education is still dropping. Why is this? The strongest correlation with these enrollment trends is obviously the pandemic, but that does not in itself indicate what particular factor of the pandemic was responsible, or even whether it was a first- or second-order effect. Is it because colleges and universities are the last and stubbornest bastions of vaccine mandates and other COVID policies in our society? Is it because students discovered that they were paying immense sums of money to learn online when comparable online training was available for a fraction of the cost? Is it because young people are disillusioned with higher education overall? Is it because this highly vaccinated population (college students) is somehow experiencing an exploding mortality rate? (From COVID, probably not, but from effects of the vaccine, still probably not but more likely given all the vaccinated college age athletes mysteriously collapsing.) What do all of these possible explanations have in common? They are all the direct result of rabid leftists. Polling proves beyond doubt that US (and Canadian) college campuses are the most left-wing enclaves in Western civilization, possibly the world—even China believes in capitalism. Not coincidentally, colleges are also practically the only places that still have vaccine mandates. They’re also the places where leftist activism is so rampant that it has diluted and co-opted all fields of study to the point that degrees indicate almost no academic rigor. To any who oppose this claim, that left activism weakens academic rigor, I will direct you to numerous scientific journals that have explicitly declared that they will not publish scientific conclusions, even in the face of overwhelming empirical evidence, which impede or oppose left political causes. So it sure sounds like universities are less and less inclined to teach any subjects or perspectives that reflect poorly on the left. In fact, students who wish to pursue high-paying careers in technical fields may find that online training is superior and more cost effective than a post-secondary degree. Show me a social problem, and I’ll show you a leftist.

After spending the last 2 years hysterical about the dangers of the pandemic and simultaneously insisting they would never conduct dangerous “gain of function” research, scientists working for the Democrats have spliced together a strain of COVID that killed 80% of the mice it was tested on. As a result of the pandemic, the Democrats have appointed themselves the champions of public health, ripping into the Republicans at every turn for supposedly not taking public health seriously enough. And when the Republicans accused the Democrats’ idol Fauci of illegally funding gain of function research on coronavirus strains in Wuhan, Fauci and the Democrats insisted that they would never fund such research because of the immense risk that dangerous pathogens escape the lab and cause a pandemic. And yet mere weeks after Biden declared that the pandemic was over, a study was published reporting that scientists in Boston had spliced together different strains of SARS-CoV-2 to create a pathogen with an 80% fatality rate in mice with humanized genetic features. Especially given the fact that a lab leak was the most likely origin of COVID-19, and how the Democrats boast of prioritizing public health, how is it they can possibly justify reckless gain of function research which yielded a chimeric coronavirus? How is this even remotely responsible? Even other scientists have spoken out calling the research alarming and wildly irresponsible. And make no mistakes, this research was Democrats’ doing: Democrats run the White House and Congress which would fund this research, Democrats are the most intimately in bed with the bioresearch and pharmaceutical industries, and scientific and research institutions across the country are lined with Democrat supporters (the vast majority of academics identify with the left). There is no way this was some Republican initiative when they hold next to no power at the federal level currently. In fact, this research was impossible while Trump was president, because the Omicron variant, which was used as part of the chimera’s genetic material, didn’t exist before November 2021 when Biden had been president for nearly a year. Anyone arguing that the Democrats are responsible on the matter of public health have no leg to stand on: they can’t claim the Democrats weren’t involved in this research, they can’t claim this research isn’t the very gain of function research that Fauci denied, and they can’t even remotely claim this is a good idea.

Once again, Biden is implying that supporting the Democrats’ opponents is destroying democracy. Isn’t it an interesting coincidence that Biden always seems to make these comments whenever polls come out showing the Democrats are on track to be crushed in the next election? But it must be stressed how dangerous his insinuations are. By all but openly stating that the opposing party is anti-democratic, it legitimizes the use of any tactic to destroy them. If we assume the Democrats’ framing of events, there can be only 2 outcomes: either the Republicans win and America descends into fascism, or the Democrats win and democracy is saved. But what if the so-called fascists have enough popular support to win a free and fair election? From that perspective, because democracy is a good in and of itself, then it is acceptable to preserve it by any means necessary... including by anti-democratic measures. In other words, if the other side winning means democracy dies anyway, then what’s the harm in engaging in undemocratic behavior, just this ONE time, to stop them? It’s either no democracy for one election or no democracy forever. And hence, the Democrats have opened the door to cheating to win elections. This is the stuff of Greek tragedies: to become like the enemy to defeat the enemy. Does this mean the Democrats are certain to cheat? Of course not. But the rhetoric they are using opens the door to that possibility: by framing the other side as evil, the Democrats back themselves into a corner where they must be willing to do anything to prevail, or be seen as capitulating to evil in the eyes of their voters. If you call your enemy evil, your supporters will now demand you defeat evil no matter what it takes, or they will turn on you. Interestingly, in adopting these talking points, the Democrats have done what they long accused Trump of: whipping up their base into a rabid mob. Because of the words Biden has used to vilify the other side, rank and file Democrat voters view Republicans are pure evil. In fact, we have already crossed a dangerous line, in which Democrat supporters have committed violence against Republicans: years ago, a Sanders supporter tried to assassinate multiple Republican congressmen. Sadly, I predict that this is not the last we will see of such violence because again, the Democrats have left no room to deescalate their initiative to delegitimize and dismantle the Republican party. Republican leaders have never so much as suggested that the Democrats are evil, anti-democratic, or should be disbanded. Some of them have merely claimed that the Democrats cheated in one singular election. But this is very different from saying that the Democrats are anti-democratic to the core and need to be stopped to preserve the republic, as the Democrats have said of the Republicans. So who are the real fascists?

Biden is being so aggressive and escalatory with Russia that dozens of elected members of his own party are speaking out. With the gradually less frequent exception of the radical left wing of the party, the Democrats are always in lockstep on policy. This is especially true of foreign policy—even the left wing’s fussing about Palestine has subsided as they’ve realized it has no chance of wholesale adoption by the Democrats. And especially on Russia, every Democrat is in agreement that Russia is the incarnation of evil and must be opposed at all costs—which, they assure us, has NOTHING to do with their loss to Trump in 2016 despite their adamant insistence that it was due to Russian interference. So the fact that Biden’s dangerous escalation of hostility with Russia is so concerning that it overrides these dissenting Democrats’ hatred of Russia really says something.

Despite the fact that white Americans are vaccinated at much higher rates than black Americans, white Americans are now the ones with a significantly higher rates of COVID. There is now no shortage of evidence that the mRNA COVID “vaccines” are worse than useless. In particular, multiple sources now indicate that the vaccinated test positive for COVID at higher rates than the unvaccinated. These latest reports only reinforce this trend. In fact, this latest report is especially illuminating, because, in the US, black people are more likely than white people to work blue-collar jobs that require them to be in-person in large groups of people. Correspondingly, white people in America are more likely to work office jobs, many of which still allow working from home. This means that white Americans are catching COVID at higher rates than black Americans DESPITE the fact that black Americans come into contact with significantly more people (on average). How can anyone continue to argue that the “vaccines” work at all? This reporting also shatters the idea that black people weren’t vaccinated because they didn’t have access to the COVID jab. Such a notion is absurd, considering the fact that the US government made the COVID immune therapy more widely available and accessible, for free, than probably any other treatment in living memory. It would appear that, rather, black people didn’t take the COVID shot because they are, understandably given the history of race relations in this country, suspicious of the medical and pharmaceutical establishment. Their skepticism has clearly been borne out. Not to mention the fact that Democrats’ assumption that black people wanted the “vaccine” but had it denied to them and simply gave up, rather than the reality that black people on average simply exercised their free individual choice not to take the treatment, is the racism at work here. The Democrats couldn’t fathom the possibility that black people just didn’t want the “vaccine”, that they must have had it withheld from them unfairly and made into victims. Assuming that every person in a racial category is a victim is racist. Acknowledging that different cultures tend—TEND—toward different choices because of different values is not. Once again, the Democrats prove themselves the true racists.

A judge in New York ruled that employees fired for refusing the COVID “vaccine” must be reinstated and awarded back pay because the vaccination requirement was arbitrary and capricious. In his opinion, the judge correctly noted that the “vaccine” requirement under the pretext of stopping the spread was invalid because vaccinated individuals spread COVID as much as the unvaccinated, if not more. He also observed that, if the requirement were truly a matter of public health, then there would be no exceptions for athletes and entertainers, that every single person would be required to get it regardless of occupation. In short, as subscribers to real science have known since the data was published, there is literally no public health basis for a COVID shot mandate, because it doesn’t stop the spread. It says a lot that a judge in one of the most left-leaning states in the country saw the “vaccine” mandates for the tyranny that they were. The landmark ruling opens the door for more such suits and victories against the authoritarian Democrats who forced an ineffective experimental immune therapy on hardworking Americans across the country.

The Democrats are so conformist and cowardly that they would rather snap into line with their party and barrel toward nuclear war than go on the record in saying that maybe Biden made a mistake in antagonizing a nuclear-armed state. Any ounce of respect that these dissenting Democrats could have earned is now gone, with interest. This cowardice is the worst trait that any party can exhibit: blind subservience to the party no matter how unhinged it gets. This is what Democrats accused the Republicans of in their support for Trump, despite the fact that there are many “Never Trump” Republicans who remain in the party. It is unthinkable to Democrats that they should ever express the merest hint of criticism. A political climate like that inevitably leads to catastrophe. No one dared criticize the Nazis or the Soviet Communists from within, and these political entities committed the most horrifying atrocities in human history. When Gabbard dared to challenge the Democrat establishment, wanting only to improve the party she had committed herself to for the sake of the American people, she was sidelined and rendered impotent until she finally left the party. Undoubtedly, the erstwhile dissenting Democrats who questioned Biden’s Russia policy were pressured by the party to recant as the midterm elections approached, so as not to diminish their chance of victory. This is yet another data point showing that the Democrats put party over country: they would rather steer the nation toward the abyss to win an election than act as sober and responsible stewards of the nation and take a hit at the polls.

The Biden administration’s refusal to even talk to its Russian counterparts to avert nuclear war is so alarming that even Obama is criticizing it (though, of course mildly, because the most important thing is Democrats winning in November). Obama recently said something extremely obvious and sensible which his fellow Democrats somehow can’t get through their heads: it’s a bad idea to cut off nearly all communication with another nuclear-armed state you are at risk of open hostilities with. Literally Biden and his party are either so inept or so fanatical that they don’t understand how profoundly dangerous it is to refuse to negotiate a deescalation in a proxy war with a world power. Are leaders like this the kind we want or can afford to have? Does any thinking, non-ideological zealot of a person think this is a good idea?

Yet another Democrat is attempting to activate their voter base by claiming that a vote for their opponents is treason against the republic, a viewpoint which is itself fascist. Consider this: if the Democrats were on track to win this midterm election, would they still be saying voting Republican is fascist? Of course not. There would be no need. Democrats may or may not sincerely believe the Republicans are fascist, but they would not risk playing with fire in expressing as much if they didn’t have to, as argued here previously. Once you call your enemy an existential threat, you rile up your base so fanatically that they will demand you use any means necessary to destroy your enemy or else accuse of you of capitulating to that enemy. The Democrats only invoke the “Republicans are fascist” rhetoric when they have no other choice, and the more they do so the more desperate they are. Desperate political entities run the risk of making dangerous moves.

The attack on Pelosi’s husband is full of puzzling details which sure do make it look like something other than a random, legitimate attack. It’s already conspicuously convenient timing that just as the Democrats are ramping up their “the Republicans are destroying democracy” rhetoric, some guy with QAnon on his social media attacks the Democrat Hose Speaker’s spouse but doesn’t kill him despite easily having the chance to. Another fishy detail is that Pelosi’s husband allegedly asked the assailant to use the bathroom, the assailant assented, and Pelosi’s husband used the reprieve to call 911. I dare any Democrat supporter to explain how it is that this attacker was a ruthless ideologically motivated assassin and yet for some reason not only didn’t kill his victim but allowed his victim to go to the bathroom and call 911. And then to make this whole story even stranger, police were reportedly admitted to the house by an “unknown person” to find the assailant and the victim struggling over a weapon. Why didn’t this third person assist Pelosi’s husband in fending off the attacker before letting police enter. It’s almost like this unidentified third person wanted to ensure that police could witness the attack so that Democrats could credibly claim to be the victim. All of this evidence is, of course, inconclusive, but it sure does smell more like a false flag operation than a bona fide home invasion and assault. Can any rational person look at the currently available evidence and conclude otherwise?

When Trump made moves to ban TikTok, the Democrats uniformly and mercilessly accused him of racism, but now that Democrats are pursuing the exact same policy no one is criticizing any supposed racism. At least one Senate Democrat had the graciousness to give Trump credit for first proposing the TikTok ban which his party is now slowly embracing. But the Democrats have offered no apology or admission that there was no inherent racism in attempting to ban a software application literally owned by a hostile enemy nation—the race of the people living in that nation have no bearing on the threat its government poses to the US. So because they never retracted their accusation of racism for a policy they now endorse, wouldn’t that make the Democrats racists too? Since the Democrats’ brand is “we’re not racist”, then it’s doubtful they would pursue a policy they explicitly deem to be racist. So the real answer is that they never thought it was a racist policy, but simply called it as such to take shots at Trump. This is yet another data point showing that the Democrats have no moral center and stand for nothing. They will simply utter any slander which helps them, even if it is plainly hypocritical.

The Democrats’ faithful servant (as of this writing), Twitter, is already granting themselves the authority to declare what races were truly won and which ones are still up in the air, and making excuses in case the midterm vote tallying takes extra long for some reason. What capacity does Twitter have to decide which claims of electoral victory are legitimate and which ones are not? The only ones who may determine that are the election officials whose role it is to tally the votes. Furthermore, after Twitter suppressed the Hunter Biden laptop story, which no journalistic outlet has been able to refute with evidence, how is it that they seriously believe they have any credibility in calling the outcome of an election in an unbiased way? So after Twitter acted as an agent of the Democrats, shielding Biden from bad press in the waning days of the 2020 election, they have the audacity to declare that they have the authority to define what a real election win looks like? In a perverse way, though, they de facto do. They can make any declaration they want about a candidate (Republican, of course) not really winning, then a journalist can point to it as evidence that the declaration of victory was illegitimate, and then the Democrats will point to that supposedly independent journalist as evidence for why they need to use the power of the federal government to oppose any such Republican candidates.

The Biden administration is investigating Twitter just days after Musk’s purchase went through, to supposedly combat the national security risk posed by foreign influence. As the Twitter user who posted this aptly points out, “everybody knows exactly why this is happening”. Does any thinking person seriously believe that this is some big coincidence? Historically, it sure didn’t look like the national security implications of Twitter’s ownership concerned the US government (under Democrats or Republicans). Neither Obama nor Biden expressed any concern with the fact that a Saudi prince wqs the second-largest shareholder. The Saudi government brutally oppresses its own people and funds terrorism. The Biden administration certainly isn’t concerned about foreign influence, since Hunter Biden took millions from Ukraine and China. So this pretense that suddenly Biden cares about who owns Twitter is unconvincing, to say the very least. So, truly, everybody DOES know why this is happening. And to apply the trusty partisan bias heuristic yet again, consider this: imagine if Twitter was cozy with the Republicans, suppressing unflattering media pieces on Trump and censoring left-wing political speech, a left-leaning billionaire bought Twitter, and then Trump’s government announced they were going to investigate the purchase. The left would be literally be rioting in the streets calling for Trump’s head. But somehow, with reality playing out pro-Democrat, we’re just supposed to accept that this is reasonable and unbiased? This is Democrat hypocrisy as glaring as it gets.

A sitting US senate Democrat has decreed that free speech doesn’t apply to challenging Democrats’ policies and integrity. Unless by “Free speech does not include spreading misinformation to downplay political violence” he meant the George Floyd rioters’ claim that police officers’ lethal negligence was cold-blooded racism in spite of body cam footage of earlier in police interaction with Floyd that showed officers being very courteous but firm with him. Or if he meant Antifa’s various outlandish left-wing claims that they make before setting federal courthouses on fire and starting firefights in downtown Portland. Or if he meant the convicted violent pedophiles at the BLM riot in Kenosha who assaulted an underage boy. If he meant those things, as well as right-leaning rhetoric that excuses political violence, then he would be taking a stand against political violence-inflaming speech in general. But since he probably didn’t intend to include those few incidents, I submit to you again that he meant speech that challenges Democrats. And even if somehow he intended an evenhanded, nonpartisan condemnation of political violence—he doesn’t, because Antifa operates in his state with impunity, but let’s pretend—that still doesn’t mean that he gets to dictate what is protected by the First Amendment, and it definitely doesn’t limit political speech. In fact, the Supreme Court has found that political speech is specifically not limited in any way. This is supported by, among many other cases, Texas v. Johnson.

As with all the Democrats’ previous warnings on the fate of democracy in the upcoming election, they all indicate that the Democrats know they’re losing and want to avert defeat by claiming that a vote for their opponents is a vote to kill democracy. What’s worse about this particular incarnation of this authoritarian tactic—delegitimizing a vote for any other viable party but their own—is that Biden is using his privileged access to government facilities to do so. It’s illegal to film oneself within a government facilty as part of an election campaign, an offense Obama was criticized for. How is this any different? In fact, it’s far more egregious because Biden is not using the Capitol Building to simply say “vote for me” or “vote for my party”, but to instead say “voting for the Republicans (the only other major party that can gain a serious presence in federal, state, and municipal governments across the country) is fascist”. To apply the effective heuristic, imagine if Trump had spoken in Congress in 2018 and said “we have a serious threat to democracy in this election, so make sure you vote for the right party”? The Democrats and their obedient attack dogs in the media would have gone nuclear. But the Democrats do it and we’re all supposed to accept the rhetorical prelude to banning the Republican party as a fair and unbiased assessment by wise and impartial leaders?

Continuing down the road toward outlawing the Republican party, Biden declared that the attack on Pelosi’s husband was Trump’s fault. At no point did Trump instruct Americans to attack Democrats or their families. In fact, his challenge to the 2020 election is one he has pursued on legal and electoral grounds, not through political violence. He has said that at this point, his legal options exhausted, he would simply run again and win. The attacker in this case, which Biden pinned on Trump, wasn’t even American, and not even in the US legally, so what stake does he have in supposedly heeding some coded Trump instruction to attack Democrats? If we really want to talk about supporting political violence, then what about when Maxine Waters strongly hinted that, if Laquan McDonald’s killer wasn’t found guilty, protesters should physically attack him. So how come Biden didn’t link her words to attacks on Republicans? Or how come he didn’t link radical abortion activists’ words to attempted assassinations of Supreme Court justices? In fact, there has been much more dangerous violence, many more close calls, coming from the left against the right than the other way around.

Biden has reduced the Strategic Petroleum Reserve down to the lowest level it has been at in 40 years. The last few presidents in both parties have drawn from this reserve to reduce gas prices, but for Biden to do so to such a staggering degree is unconscionable and extremely reckless. His party’s economic policies are so abysmal that there is essentially no pulling out of the economic nose dive before the midterms. And yet in spite of this, Biden still attempted to use the US’s taxpayer-funded national security stockpile to get his party reelected. He is dipping into emergency petroleum for wartime just so that his party wins. If Trump handed out oil barrels as freely as Biden, the Democrats would never let him hear the end of it. Let this be a reminder that the Democrats are for party above country, always. They accuse the Republicans of this relentlessly, and that’s exactly how you know that it is more true of Democrats than their rival party.

Pelosi’s husband’s attacker is an illegal immigrant, finally hitting Democrats with the consequences of their open border policies. Democrats love to talk about immigration as though everyone who comes to the US legally is a totally upstanding person who simply can’t afford to wait in line and go through the immigration process legally. This is what happens when you make that assumption. If one is an immigrant and one is a law-abiding person, what do they have to hide by circumventing the legal immigration process? On the other hand, why would one dodge legal immigration procedure UNLESS they had something to hide that would disqualify them? This is simpl logic that a 9-year-old can understand, and yet this comes as a surprise to Democrats. Now they’re suffering the consequences of just assuming anyone who comes here is an innocent, harmless person. If they had simply enforced immigration law, the people who are too dangerous to have come here legally would get promptly deported. Violent incidents like this will keep happening until the Democrats learn this simple lesson.

New reporting has emerged showing that DHS has engaged in full-on thought policing by directing social media which online speech to censor. It would be one thing if social media, completely independent of any input from the government, decided to “moderate” content in line with their clearly published “community standards”. But it is a completely different matter for the government to directly instruct social media to censor speech online. This is, as the federal courts have ruled in multiple cases, unconstitutional, a violation of the First Amendment. And of course, the censorship conveniently covers all the issues on which the Democrats are challenged for their catastrophically failed policies. Any challenge to Democrat COVID policies which destroyed American small businesses and the economy with it, Democrat policies imposing neo-racism under the guise of “racial justice”, Democrat policies to leave billions of dollars worth of equipment to terrorists in Afghanistan, and Democrat policies to risk nuclear war so they can defend a country that funnels millions of dollars to the Bidens from that country’s corrupt oligarchs, is suppressed by the federal government as “disinformation”. All the Democrats’ lies, though, are of course perfectly permissible, protected by the First Amendment, and left completely undisturbed by the DHS. The Democrat lie that the COVID “vaccines” stop transmission (they absolutely fail to do so), the Democrat lie that every American is racist (this is obviously preposterous on its face), the Democrat lie that the exit from Afghanistan was smooth (there’s nothing smooth about giving terrorists billions in top-tier military hardware), and the Democrat lie that Russia attacked Ukraine completely unprovoked (Russia told the West not to make Ukraine pro-Western or else they’d attack, and the West did anyway) are all allowed by DHS to flourish online... because that’s just people exercising their free speech, apparently. So for the Democrats, any lie they utter is free speech, while any uncomfortable truth the Republicans express is dangerous misinformation that cannot be allowed to reach the American people. It is hard to find more glaring examples of authoritarianism: using the power of the federal government to enforce your warped worldview over the truth put forward by one’s opponents. In fact censorship proves the censor’s lies: why would one need to censor if one has the truth on one’s side? I dare anyone to look all this evidence in the face and still argue that the Democrats aren’t the true authoritarians.

Death from alcohol rose by 26% in the US due to COVID lockdowns, despite Democrats’ insistence that the lockdown saved lives. It is already established that the lockdowns, as imposed by the Democrats, only reduced COVID deaths by 0.5%. This figure is so minuscule that the corresponding 26% increase in alcohol-related deaths likely more than offsets the reduced mortality. And this is only the spike in alcohol-related deaths—it doesn’t even count all the other “deaths of despair” that the lockdowns caused to spike like suicides and drug overdoses. Insisting that these are insignificant and that the lockdowns worked is an odd line for a party that claims to value mental health to take. But then again, that’s because the Democrats never really cared about mental health. If they did, then the rate of mental illness wouldn’t be so much higher among Democrats than Republicans. It’s funny how negative social dynamic that the Democrats claim to fight against is more acute in every Democrat-heavy demographic group: racially correlated poverty in multi-generationally Democrat-controlled cities, racism committed by the left, sexual harassment on Democrats’ staffs, mental illness among Democrats, gun crime in Democrat gun-controlled cities and states, etc. How is it that anyone who legitimately cares about these issues doesn’t notice that the Democrats have utterly failed to address any of them? When will people finally understand that the Democrat cure is worse than the disease?

NBC reported that Pelosi answered the door when police showed up, did not “declare an emergency” was taking place, and walked back into the house toward the attacker. How can any rational person consider this fact and still argue that this is consistent with a legitimate, unstaged attack? Anyone over the age of 9 should be able to tell you that this doesn’t seem like the behavior of the victim of a real attack. Furthermore, how is it not suspicious that NBC took down this video report without any explanation? News media sometimes gets stories wrong, but when they do they issue a correction or retraction in order to preserve their credibility. Especially since the overwhelming majority of journalists willingly serve the Democrats’ every whim, you would think that NBC would eagerly retract this story if it was wrong, so that they could continue to enable the Democrats’ victimhood status. Instead, NBC pulled the video with no notice of any kind, as if they were hoping no one would catch it. Is that the behavior of a news outlet pursuing the truth at all costs, wherever it leads, for the good of the American public? That was rhetorical, because the answer is obviously not. Though not conclusive, this is enough circumstantial evidence to shift the burden of proof onto those who claim this was a legitimate attack. We still don’t know for sure, but there is now way more that is inconsistent with such an incident than consistent. Of course, by what I’m sure we are supposed to believe is a coincidence, this attack happened so close to the midterm election that we won’t know the truth before the votes are all cast. Interesting timing, isn’t it?

A new study shows that COVID, which pharmaceutical giants and public health officials assured us could ONLY be treated with experimental mRNA immune therapy, is easily treatable by taking twice-daily doses of zinc. Again, there were doctors on the frontline of the pandemic desperate to treat patients who, before there was a COVID shot, resorted to creative treatments to keep people alive. Some of these treatments held promise, but required further study. But when these doctors asked the CDC to follow up on treatments such as ivermectin and zinc, the CDC flatly refused. How is this the behavior of a rational, responsible institution dedicated to public safety? What public health objectives are met by deliberately refusing to assess the viability of a cheap and highly available treatment to a pandemic claiming the lives of hundreds of thousands? Not only have pharma megacompanies profited from experimental COVID shots, but also from COVID pills (also of doubtful effectiveness). And yet somehow years later we learn there is an extremely cheap and accessible alternative? Are we really supposed to believe that this is 100% coincidental? Everyone in the CDC and the FDA who shut down follow-up studies on repurposing drugs like ivermectin and zinc should be investigated for any financial ties to the pharmaceutical industry and, if found to have such ties, imprisoned for the rest of their natural lives.

The Democrat smear campaign against Twitter continues as the final days before the midterm election wind down. Biden has now stated that Twitter “spews lies”. Interesting that he wasn’t making any such pointed accusations when Twitter suppressed a true unflattering story about his son just days before he was elected president, isn’t it? How is suppressing a truth that is of vital public interest—the moral character of a presidential candidate’s family—different from spreading a lie? This just shows that the Democrats have no integrity or ethical foundation of any kind. They cover for lies that benefit them and denounce any statement, true or false, that criticizes them.

Now that Twitter is no longer owned by the Democrats’ faithful servants, the platform is finally giving Democrats a taste of the fact-checking they love imposing on everyone else so much. When Biden tweeted about bringing gas prices down to the “most common” price of $3.19, Twitter fact-checkers correctly pointed out that this figure (the statistical mode) is not the same as the average gas price (the statistical mean). Any high school math student should be able to tell you that the mean price, which Biden conveniently omitted, is far more indicative of the current state of gas prices than the mode price he cited. Did Biden lie? Technically, no, since there is no reason that that mode figure could not be derived from the data. It is, however, misleading, which is why it was used instead of the average gas price. I wonder if Democrats still appreciate Twitter’s effort at fact-checking, especially since Biden just accused Twitter of allowing too many lies to circulate. Something tells me this is something they’d be OK with the fact-checkers skipping over. If Democrats want to play the fact-checking game, they should be prepared to face the consequences.

As the Democrats blame the entire Republican party for suspiciously timed attacks on their politicians’ families, the much more serious violence against Republican politicians continues. A white powder was sent to the home of Republican candidate Kari Lake. This is the latest in a string of violent threats to Republicans over the last few years, including attempts to assassinate conservative Supreme Court justices and a shooting of Republican members of Congress. If one attack on a Democrat’s family, possibly random or quite possibly staged, is enough to condemn the entire Republican party as advocating violence against the Democrats, then how are the Republicans not justified in calling the Democrats jackboot authoritarians who condone political violence against THEIR opponents? It is laughably common for the Democrats to condemn the Republicans for lesser offenses than the ones they themselves commit. Or at least, it would be laughable if they double-standard they were playing with wasn’t so frighteningly dangerous. This particular double-standard is straight out of the extreme left’s playbook: they are allowed to engage in political violence as they see fit, but if they can frame their opponents as doing so, then it authorizes them to eradicate that opposition from the political arena.

The chair of the Republican Party declared what should be an uncontroversial assumption that the Democrats insisted could not be assumed: that the Republicans would respect the midterm election outcome as long as the election is conducted transparently and they are allowed to pursue election challenges through the court system as the law allows. The Democrats have been trying to convince the electorate that the Republicans are out to destroy democracy, but what can be more democratic than both vowing respect for the outcome AND affirming the right to challenge elections peacefully in the courts? At most, the Democrats can only be said to respect the first of these, but not the second. Recall how the Democrats vilified the Republicans for pursuing election challenges via the law in 2020, as is EVERY candidate’s right. So really, who respects democracy less, the party that doesn’t believe elections should be verified or challenged (Democrats) or the one that respects the vote after challenges reach their conclusion (Republicans)?

Yet another Democrat has declared that America only has a democracy if the Democrats win. This is the exact same rhetoric as authoritarian one-party states like China: they claim to have democracy as long as their party is the one that wins, that any other party winning shatters said “democracy”. This is as authoritarian as any statement can possibly get, because it debases the very soul of democracy. Democracy is only democratic if any challenger is allowed to win if they receive enough votes. The Democrats have now fully and nakedly embraced the language of tyrants the world over: they are every bit the authoritarians as the Chinese Communist Party, Putin’s Russian political faction, the North Korean communists, and the Iranian religious hardliners, among many others. What business do Democrats have of telling anyone what constitutes democracy?

Even fellow Democrats are now worried that their party is so extreme that it’s repelling moderate voters. It’s stunning that it took Democrats this long to realize that destroying the economy for negligible reduction in pandemic deaths, forcing Americans under penalty of lost jobs to get an experimental gene therapy, letting criminals run free in every major American city, and censoring anyone who dares criticize them might be seen as extreme to a normal, rational person. And that is just a small taste of the extremism they have wrought—this corner of the Internet has warned of far more authoritarian abuses and staggering incomptencies. But this leftward radicalization of the Democrat party as been going full speed ahead since at least the end of the Obama presidency, and only now they’re seeing it. If one had to guess, it’s probably because the party has sidelined, ejected, or driven away all the sensible figures in their party, like Gabbard. They will not learn this lesson. They didn’t learn it when Trump won, they didn’t learn it Gabbard left the party, and they won’t get it when they lose in the midterms. Every lesson they don’t learn will not only allow but encourage them to continue radicalizing. The Democrats have become a cult so convinced of its own righteousness that it takes criticism and resistance as a signal to double down and get more extreme.

Biden is such a rampant liar that even the Washington Post, which never fails to go to bat for the Democrats when they need it most, finds his lies egregious. Wasn’t Biden the one who said he would restore truth to the White House where Trump was a shameful liar? Isn’t that the very definition of gaslighting, which the Democrats swear they never do (which is now gaslighting about gaslighting)? Isn’t Biden the one keeps talking about how dangerous “misinformation” is to democracy (a talking point he used as recently as last week)? So what’s his excuse? All politicians lie. Trump certainly did. But he also never claimed to be this unwavering beacon of truth. The Democrats have this peculiar and audacious habit of claiming to be so much better than their opponents in a certain regard, only to slink around and try to get away with being MORE blameworthy in that same regard. At this point, there are perpetually good odds that whatever the Democrats accuse the Republicans, the Democrats have also done but worse.

Biden himself has doubled down on the words of his administration’s underlings indicating that he would look into Musk’s purchase of Twitter, even though they raised no objections in the months between Musk’s announcements and the deal closing. As was aptly put by a commentator previously, every single rational person knows exactly what this is all about. This is not because Biden sincerely cares who runs social media companies. If it was, he would have banned TikTok 2 years ago, and he would have spent his time in the Obama White House investigating all the Saudi and Chinese money invested in American tech companies. But he did none of that. He waited until someone who announced he’d oppose the censorship he swears his party doesn’t do assumes control of Twitter and THEN he investigates Twitter. Does Biden not realize how guilty this makes him and his party look? They claim they don’t censor anyone on Twitter, and then when a new Twitter owner comes along and says censorship on the platform is over, they investigate that new owner. And in doing so, Biden’s response to opposition to his authoritarianism is more authoritarianism. Imagine if this happened in Russia. Putin claims he doesn’t censor anyone. So now imagine if Navalny bought Russian Twitter promising to end censorship and then Putin investigated Navalny. Biden would drop everything to give a statement about how that is tyranny and America won’t let it go unpunished. Yet Biden is doing exactly what he would condemn among our enemies (and rightly so). With the Democrats, there is no tyranny they aren’t willing to inflict on their opponents if they can get away with it, and there is no moral objectivity. There is only what they can use as a cudgel against their opponents, and what they will simultaneously do and deny when they get caught doing it. Are these the kind of authoritarian leaders you can afford to live under?

Pundits on NBC, which is basically the media arm of the Democrats, freely made a sexist remark about a Republican woman that they would mercilessly condemn if made about a Democrat woman. The pundits stated with glee that if Boebert lost her reelection, she should essentially become a sex worker. Typically, the left would see such a remark as sexist, because it suggests that all a woman is good for is sex. They’re implying that Boebert couldn’t get any other paying job, like being a an entrepreneur, a corporate executive, a news media figure, or any number of other jobs the left usually insists to the hilt that women are capable of. All she would have to fall back on, these NBC “journalists” suggest, is selling her body. This is yet another data point that the Democrats believe in nothing. They don’t care about women, because when the mask comes off they think of women as the very sex objects they deny reducing women to. So next time the Democrats say they care about women so much (probably in the context of abortion), think about that. And while you’re at it, think about how Democrats are OK with biological males who declare themselves “women” obliterating biological females in athletics and raping biological females in women’s prisons. In fact, they’re so OK with these things that if even a woman on the left calls them into question the Democrats will call that left-leaning woman a bigot and make sure she never works again. That’s EXACTLY how much Democrats care about women.

Doing exactly what they swore the Republicans would do, Democrats claim that their loss in Florida was because DeSantis cheated. Didn’t the Democrats say that anyone who made accusations of cheating was anti-democracy and is a danger to the nation? How are these Democrats not being condemned by their fellow party members for unraveling the fabric of democracy? Oh, that’s right, because the Democrats don’t stand for anything. Any standards they profess to be sacred are only applied to their opponents. Democrats themselves are allowed a free pass to transgress even the most sacred norms of our republic. Democrats think nothing of taking away Americans’ free speech rights, forcing an experimental medical treatment on them, and refusing to accept the results of elections they themselves claim to have secured. But if a Republican even contemplated any of these things, then the Democrats are justified in destroying their career by any means necessary. The Democrats have neither integrity nor shame. They are the lowliest authoritarian scum our country has ever concentrated in one place because they not only embrace authoritarianism, but gaslight us and then accuse their opponents of being the authoritarians.

The city of Portland has hired a left-wing terrorist group whose members publicly advocate violence to train the city’s police. Wasn’t the entire reason for the left’s radical activism that the police are supposedly too violent? More importantly, how does a group that tried to set federal property on fire and wrested control of part of the city from the legal government thereof have any right to train that city’s police? How is such a group even remotely welcome in the city government? This group flagrantly broke some of the most serious laws on the books in the city of Portland, the state of Oregon, and the entire United States. Anitfa is the very definition of terrorists: entities which use violence to seek some political outcome. So how are domestic leftist terrorists not only un-antagonized by the police but welcomed in to train them? I dare anyone to claim that Democrats oppose domestic terrorism when Democrats literally let terrorists train cops. The Democrats just oppose the right, plain and simple. The Democrats pursue nonviolent right-leaning groups far less radical than Antifa while inviting Antifa into their police departments. If you want a picture of fascism, look no further than Portland Democrats... and other cities’ Democrats soon to follow, no doubt. The Democrats’ embrace of extremist street thugs on their side of the political spectrum is the exact same playbook the Nazis ran as they ascended power in Germany: government officials worked with their jackboot street enforcers to intimidate their opponents. This is 100 times worse than any supposed fascism the Republicans have supposedly exhibited.

Democrats are now practicing the very redlining they claim to be against, all in the name of “racial justice” of course. A pro-Democrat real estate developer is planning to open a mall in Minneapolis that will actively oppose the opening of businesses owned by white Americans. How is this not redlining but applied to a different racial group? If someone opened a mall that kept non-whites from operating their businesses there, everyone would (rightly) be outraged. But yet the left is doing exactly that, just not to non-whites, and has the audacity to claim this isn’t only not racist but “racial justice”. Not only that, but setting up a dedicated space for non-white business owners is also racist against the very people it tries to help, because what it implies is that non-whites can’t succeed unless certain groups are excluded from competing with them. This move literally sets property aside that only a much smaller subset of the population of Minneapolis has access to. The real estate developer is, by his actions, essentially saying “you non-whites can’t compete against whites on a level-playing field, so I have to exclude them in order for you to have a chance”. I invite any leftist to explain how this isn’t racist against the very people it claims to defend. But this is classic Democrat: anything they claim to be against they are even more strongly for, with racism at the top of the list. The Democrats were racist during the Civil War, they were racist during the Civil Rights era, and they took their racism and repackaged it as “anti-racism” today. And Democrats’ policies ensure that non-whites are exactly the victims they insist they are, and then claim to have the only solution to the problem they created. There is no more racist party than the Democrats.

Despite literally declaring that the pandemic was over, Biden is moving to extend his COVID-related emergency powers. Strange that he needs more emergency powers for an emergency he said was over, don’t you think? How is this not authoritarian? There is not a shred of doubt that if Trump did this, it would be all over the news, and the Democrats would start a whole new impeachment proceeding. At their core, the Democrats are tyrants, and they will take any shred of power they can under any pretext.

After years of the COVID “vaccines” being on the market accompanied by constant dismissal of concerns of myocarditis, Pfizer and Moderna are now investigating the potential risk of myocarditis these therapies pose. For the last nearly 2 years, public health officials and drug manufacturer spokespeople insisted that talk of the risk of myocarditis was misinformation, the ramblings of crazed conspiracy theorists. But if such claims were totally crackpot, why is it that these companies are now seriously concerned with the possibility that their COVID drugs can lead to myocarditis? And if the “vaccines” were as thoroughly tested as they claimed, how is it possible that they didn’t have any idea of these potential side-effects until now? Does it have anything to do with their attempt to hide their testing data from the public for decades? And of course, no one has issued so much as an admission of error for dismissing concerns of myocarditis, much less an apology for vilifying those who were simply concerned with peoples’ health. But again, either the drug companies knew that myocarditis was a possible side-effect and intentionally withheld this information, or they are so staggeringly inept that they had no idea. Either way, how are pharma companies entities that people can even remotely trust at this point? And as a result, how is it that the government has any businesses coercing us into consume these companies’ products?

Once again, a Democrat “anti-racist” policy, this time “bail reform” (i.e. eliminating bail and letting even those charged with a violent crime roam free) is more racist by their own definition of racism. For the Democrats, any social dynamic that has outcomes that are distributed across races in a disproportionate way (not to scale with the race’s proportion to the overall US population) is racist. The data clearly indicates that African-Americans are disproportionately the victims of violent crime. So when a policy allows violent criminals back on the street before their trial, if they re-offend, they are more likely to victimize black Americans. This is exactly what is playing out: violent criminals let out without bail, on a policy predicated on helping black people, are running loose and injuring and killing black people. None of this is saying that all who are let out without bail are violent. But some are. And those few are enough to destroy innocent lives. But the Democrats don’t seem to care that those lives are overwhelmingly black. I dare Democrats to explain how this isn’t racist.

Even though it has been well-established for a year now that the COVID “vaccine” does not in any way stop transmission and never did against any variant, NBC news is still spreading the lie that you can keep someone (in this case a child) from contracting COVID by avoiding the unvaccinated. This epidemiological reality is the only conclusion that can be reached from a review of the data. To say otherwise is nothing other than a lie. Why is a major media outlet continuing to spread misinformation? And how dare they claim that they have the right to combat misinformation, dictating which views deserve to be expressed and which must be suppressed for the public good? Either NBC is failing spectacularly in their role as journalists, pursuing and stating the truth to the public, or they don’t care what the truth is and instead serve the agenda of a group that has a vested interest in coercing as many people to vaccinate for COVID as possible.
