And which group would that be, that is hell-bent on getting everyone to take an experimental drug which, at best, reduces COVID symptoms until a year goes by and the virus mutates away from the mRNA pattern in the drug? Oh, that’s right, the Democrats, the same Democrats that collectively own millions in Pfizer and Moderna stock. The same Democrats who are trying to convince as many children as possible to become lifelong pharma customers by transitioning genders and taking hormone supplements, which would drive their millions in pharma stock even higher. Americans would really like to hear how it is NBC can justify lying about a topic which we all agree is vital to hear the truth about.

Philadelphia is so low on police that they are hiring ordinary citizens to pick up some law enforcement functions. If the Democrats are so tough on crime, how come every major Democrat-controlled city can’t find enough cops to hit the minimum level to keep the city safe, while suburbs and small towns are not having this same problem (at least not to the same degree)? Are we just supposed to believe that it’s a coincidence that the Democrats demonized police, began partially dismantling their police forces, shut down everyone’s business to accomplish statistically insignificant reductions in pandemic deaths, and then crime spiked the most it’s ever increased in a single year in America? I really want to hear the Democrats’ alternative explanation for why every city they control is descending into lawlessness and violence.

Biden is continuing to insist on the need for emergency powers to fight COVID even though a sizable contingent of his own party in the Senate is against it. Why does he need this power when he himself said the pandemic is over? And why is he willing to fight much of his own party and veto a vote that is close to the veto override threshold? Imagine if Trump did this. The media and the Democrats would be having a meltdown about Trump being a fascist. Yet when Biden does this, he endures no criticism.

The shady businessman behind the spectacularly imploding FTX crypto exchange used his company to funnel more than $27 million to the Democrats, making him the largest single donor to the Democrats after Soros. Interesting that the Democrats seem to like to pal around with sleazy characters like Bankman-Fried, and then turn around and say how Republicans love “dark money”. The Democrats also really criticized super PACs about 10 years ago but seem pretty comfortable with them now that they leverage them to way out-fundraise their opponents (most of the time). Also, isn’t the Democrat position on crypto that it’s bad because it facilitates anonymous transactions (which of course means that it allows people to donate to causes they don’t like) and generates an immense amount of pollution? So why is it that they had no problem taking so much money from not just a crypto tycoon but one who is such an apparently shameless fraudster?

A local San Francisco news station is reporting that police body camera footage confirms that Paul Pelosi is indeed the individual who opened the door to his home for police, during an attack where he supposedly had to fight for his life. Again, how is it that Pelosi’s attacker allowed him to open the door to his house for law enforcement if the attacker was in a position to injure him using a blunt object? How can an attacker go from physically assaulting a victim to letting that victim admit police into the scene of the altercation? This claim was initially dismissed by the left as fabricated, but it appears to be very likely true. Those who insist that this attack was authentic and politically motivated, and not apolitical or staged, have a lot of explaining to do. Again, the evidence against the authenticity of this attack is circumstantial, but the evidence (circumstantial or otherwise) in favor of it is non-existent.

The Democrat nominated to take over the House Democrat leadership for Pelosi denied multiple elections in which Republicans won and rejects the legitimacy of the Supreme Court, yet somehow isn’t condemned by the “guardian of democracy” Democrats. The most loyal of the Democrats’ media servants has concocted a crackpot accusation that the runoff election process in Georgia, which merely pits the top 2 vote-earners—in this case 2 black candidates—in a head-to-head race whenever the general election does not yield 50% or more votes to any one candidate, is racist. Another bombshell report sourcing internal Twitter documents shows that the practice of blacklisting and shadow-banning—practices which the company unequivocally denied to engage in—of conservative accounts was widespread. The evidence cited in the reporting to indicate the reality of these practices is extensive. Vijaya Gadde, the same employee who spearheaded the suppression of the Hunter Biden laptop story, outright lied in stating in 2018 that “We do not shadow ban. And we certainly don’t shadow ban based on political viewpoints or ideology.” This is only true in the sense that the company didn’t call their policies which amounted to shadow-banning “shadow-banning”. “Visibility Filtering” was the internal name Twitter used instead, a process which could consist of partial to total restrictions on an account’s inclusion in search results, the trending page, hashtag searches, and more. Examples of this abound. A doctor who argued that COVID lockdowns would harm children (which has now been proven beyond doubt to be true) was placed on a “trends blacklist”. Other conservatives were placed on a “search blacklist” preventing others from discovering them. Politically right voices were also routinely placed on a “do not amplify” protocol. All of these could be plainly seen as labeels denoted on an internal dashboard for each account. But for the right-aligned (or really just political, non-left aligned) accounts with the biggest impact, Twitter reserved a special accelerated process called “SIP-PES” which bypassed any official ticketing system and allowed top officials to make arbitrary calls. Libs of TikTok got banned via this process, with the company invoking the “hateful conduct” policy to do so even though internally Twitter censors admitted that this did not apply. Their argument was that the account’s content, showing shocking things liberals say out in the open, enabled others to act hatefully. However, when Libs of TikTok’s owner was doxxed (her non-public photo, name, and address circulated without her permission), which ACTUALLY enabled violence against her, and she appealed to have her information taken down, Twitter refused to take action. This report furnishes yet more evidence that Twitter arbitrarily censored accounts expressing views the left did not like. Not only that, but Twitter officials would unfairly apply moderation policies via unaccountable secret processes to do so. There can now be no denying that Twitter loyally served the interest of the Democrats by prosecuting a merciless witch hunt against vocal opponents of the Democrats. And wll the while Twitter had the audacity to ask users to trust its judgment.
